options.name: Deal with Alert (Bright Flare)
options.description: Someone might investigate the light.

title: Comparing Tumbler to Symbols
description: You hold the Whispering Tumbler near the lighthouse wall symbols (if you have it). The Tumbler hums louder, vibrating in your hand. Specific symbols on the wall glow brighter, matching intricate patterns on the Tumbler itself. It feels like a key designed for a lock woven into reality.

items.name: Whispering Tumbler
items.description: Key Fragment, resonating with lighthouse symbols.

options.name: Try Inserting Tumbler into Wall?
options.description: Attempt to physically press the Tumbler against a matching symbol.

options.name: Focus Mental Energy (Resonance)
options.description: Try to use the Tumbler's resonance to interact with the wall.

options.name: Note Matching Symbols, Ascend
options.description: Remember the connection, head upstairs.

title: Sounds from Above (Lighthouse)
description: Continuing up the stairs, the sounds become clearer: rhythmic chanting OR mechanical whirring and clicking OR muffled speech.

options.name: Approach Source Quietly
options.description: Reach the next level and peek.

title: Checking Stairs for Traps
description: You carefully check the stairs as you ascend. [Perception check DC 14]. Success: You spot a nearly invisible pressure plate halfway up OR faint arcane glyphs on certain steps. Failure: The stairs seem safe.

options.name: Attempt to Disable/Avoid Trap (If Found)
options.description: Try bypassing the detected hazard.

options.name: Proceed (If None Found / Disabled)
options.description: Continue upwards.

title: Lighting the Way (Lighthouse)
description: You light a torch or lantern. The flickering light illuminates the oppressive darkness of the stairwell but also makes your presence much more obvious to anyone above.

options.name: Continue Ascending (Less Stealthy)
options.description: Proceed upwards with light.

options.name: Extinguish Light, Proceed in Darkness
options.description: Decide stealth is more important.

title: Descending Lighthouse Stairs
description: Having second thoughts, you retreat back down the spiral staircase to the lighthouse entry chamber.

options.name: Re-examine Entry Chamber
options.description: Look for clues you missed.

options.name: Leave the Lighthouse
options.description: Exit the building.

title: Servant on Valerius's Research
description: 'The Master studies the Confluence,' the servant drones. 'Tides, stars, echoes of the Outer Spheres. He seeks... alignment. Understanding. Control.' The word 'control' hangs in the air.

options.name: Ask About 'Control'
options.description: 'Control of what?'

options.name: Give Up Questioning
options.description: He's being evasive. Ascend stairs.

title: Servant on Lighthouse History
description: 'Ancient,' the servant replies tonelessly. 'Built by... others. Before the current age. To watch... or to contain. The Master finds its mechanisms... illuminating.'

options.name: Ask About 'Others'/'Contain'
options.description: 'Who built it? Contain what?'

options.name: Give Up Questioning
options.description: Ascend stairs.

title: Pressing the Servant (Charisma/Threats)
description: You try using persuasion or intimidation on the gaunt servant. He remains utterly impassive, his blank eyes unfocused. Your words seem to have no effect whatsoever. He is unnervingly unresponsive.

options.name: Give Up, Ascend Stairs
options.description: Talking is useless.

options.name: Consider Attacking Him?
options.description: Maybe force is the only way?

title: Servant on Job Dangers
description: 'Dangers?' the servant echoes. 'Precision is required. Misalignment could cause... energetic feedback. Vertigo is common near the Array. Follow the Master's instructions precisely.'

options.name: Enter Lighthouse
options.description: Accept the risks.

options.name: Decline Job, Leave
options.description: Sounds too dangerous.

title: Scholarly Rivalry Noted
description: You note the apparent professional (or philosophical) disagreement between Valerius and Elara. This might be useful later, perhaps playing them against each other or seeking contrasting viewpoints.

options.name: Proceed Inside Lighthouse
options.description: Continue your investigation.

title: Looting the Servant
description: Searching the defeated servant, you find nothing of value - no coins, no keys, just simple grey robes.

options.name: Enter the Lighthouse
options.description: Proceed inside.

title: Waking Up Captive (Lighthouse)
description: You regain consciousness, finding yourself bound and lying on the cold stone floor of the lighthouse entry chamber. The gaunt servant watches you with blank eyes.

options.name: Wait for Valerius?
options.description: See who comes to deal with you.

options.name: Try to Loosen Bonds
options.description: Test the ropes discreetly.

title: Approaching Lighthouse Level
description: You reach a landing or doorway on the lighthouse stairs. Peeking cautiously, you see a laboratory filled with strange instruments OR a library stacked with ancient tomes OR the main chamber where Valerius or others are present.

options.name: Enter Laboratory
options.description: Investigate the humming/clicking instruments.

options.name: Enter Library
options.description: Investigate the books (related to chanting?).

options.name: Observe Main Chamber
options.description: Watch Valerius/Unbound/Keeper (whoever is present).

title: Encounter on Stairs
description: As you reach the next level, you come face-to-face with someone descending the stairs - the gaunt servant OR an Unbound cultist OR Keeper Marius OR Valerius himself!

options.name: Attempt Diplomacy/Bluff
options.description: Try to talk your way past.

options.name: Attack Immediately
options.description: Strike first.

options.name: Attempt to Retreat Downstairs
options.description: Try to flee back down.

title: Searching Lighthouse Cellar
description: Searching the damp cellar: You find mostly mundane supplies (old ropes, barrels of brine). However, tucked in a corner is a locked sea chest OR loose stones in the wall reveal a hidden niche.

options.name: Attempt to Open Sea Chest
options.description: Pick lock or force it open.

options.name: Investigate Hidden Niche
options.description: See what's hidden behind the stones.

options.name: Ascend Cellar Stairs
options.description: Leave the cellar.

title: Ascending from Cellar
description: You climb the rickety wooden stairs from the cellar, emerging into the lighthouse's main entry chamber.

options.name: Assess Entry Chamber
options.description: Look around the base level.

title: Listening from Cellar
description: Listening at the top of the cellar stairs: You hear footsteps moving about in the entry chamber above OR silence.

options.name: Ascend Cautiously (If Footsteps)
options.description: Prepare for encounter.

options.name: Ascend (If Silence)
options.description: Seems clear.

options.name: Wait/Search Cellar More
options.description: Delay going up.

title: Alerted Occupants (Lighthouse)
description: Your noisy attempt to force the grate alerted someone inside! You hear heavy footsteps approaching the cellar stairs from above, or perhaps the main door opening.

options.name: Hide Near Grate
options.description: Try to conceal yourself outside.

options.name: Flee the Area
options.description: Run from the lighthouse.

options.name: Prepare to Fight
options.description: Get ready for whoever emerges.

title: Noise Unnoticed (Lighthouse)
description: Despite the noise you made, there's no audible reaction from within the lighthouse. Either no one heard, no one's home, or they don't care.

options.name: Try Forcing Grate Again?
options.description: Make another attempt.

options.name: Try Main Door/Climbing
options.description: Attempt a different entrance.

options.name: Leave
options.description: Give up.

title: Prying Lighthouse Bars
description:
Clinging to the wall, you try to pry the window bars. [Strength check DC 16].

Success: With great effort, a bar bends just enough to create an opening!

Failure: The bars are solid iron, resisting your strength.

options.name: Squeeze Through Opening (If Success)
options.description: Enter the lighthouse.

options.name: Try Another Window/Climb Down (If Failure)
options.description: This window is impassable.

title: Peering Through Lighthouse Window
description: Cleaning the grimy glass, you peer inside the lighthouse level. You see a sparsely furnished room - perhaps a guard post? OR shelves lined with books? OR strange machinery?

options.name: Note Room Contents
options.description: Remember what you saw.

options.name: Try Bars Again / Climb Down
options.description: Decide next move based on observation.

title: Climbing Higher (Lighthouse)
description: You continue your perilous climb up the lighthouse wall towards the next set of windows or the lantern room itself. [Requires another Athletics check, likely higher DC].

options.name: Reach Higher Level (If Success)
options.description: Arrive at the next stage.

options.name: Fall! (If Failure)
options.description: Lose your grip and plummet. [Take significant falling damage].

title: Climbing Down Lighthouse
description: Deciding the climb is too dangerous or fruitless, you carefully make your way back down the lighthouse wall to the ground.

options.name: Try Different Entrance (Door/Grate)
options.description: Attempt another way in.

options.name: Leave Lighthouse Area
options.description: Give up on entering.

title: Squeezing Through Window Gap
description: You manage to squeeze through the narrow opening created by the bent/removed window bar, dropping into the room inside. [Possible Stealth check to land quietly?].

options.name: Assess Current Room
options.description: Look around the room you entered.

title: Dealing with Dockmaster's Guard
description: You approach the guard watching the Dockmaster's storage shed. You could try bribing him, creating a diversion, or perhaps using stealth to get past.

options.name: Attempt Bribe
options.description: Offer coin for him to look away. [Persuasion check].

options.name: Create Diversion
options.description: Cause a commotion elsewhere on the pier.

options.name: Attempt Stealth
options.description: Try to sneak past him to the shed door.

title: Scouting Dockmaster's Shed
description: Observing the shed: It's sturdy wood, one door with a heavy padlock, one barred window. A single guard patrols intermittently.

options.name: Target Padlock (Night)
options.description: Attempt to pick or break the lock after dark.

options.name: Target Window (Night)
options.description: Try prying bars or breaking glass.

options.name: Deal with Guard First
options.description: Plan to bribe, distract, or incapacitate the guard.

title: Dock Shed Heist (Night)
description: Under cover of night, you approach the Dockmaster's shed. The guard might be less alert or absent. You target the padlock.

options.name: Pick Padlock
options.description: [Thieves' Tools DC 14?].

options.name: Break Padlock (Noisy)
options.description: [Strength check DC 15? Risk alerting guard].

options.name: Guard Intervenes!
options.description: The guard spots you before you start.

title: Dock Shed Diversion
description: You create a diversion (shouts, dropped cargo) further down the pier. The guard near the shed hesitates, then moves to investigate the noise.

options.name: Quickly Pick/Break Lock
options.description: Use the time to enter the shed.

options.name: Diversion Fails / Guard Returns Quickly
options.description: Not enough time!

title: Chasing the Tail
description: The spy panics and runs! You give chase through the streets and alleys of Nestlebrook.

options.name: Catch the Spy
options.description: [Athletics check?]. Corner him for interrogation/combat.

options.name: Lose the Spy
options.description: He gets away.

title: Tail Reveals Employer
description: The spy admits who hired him: Silas the fence OR Borin the merchant OR the Guard Captain OR agents matching the Unbound/Keeper description.

options.name: Deal with Spy (Let Go? Silence?)
options.description: Decide the spy's fate.

options.name: Confront Employer
options.description: Go confront the person who hired the spy.

title: Tail Intimidated
description: Your intimidation works. The spy reveals Silas hired him, then flees.

options.name: Confront Silas
options.description: Go talk to the pawnbroker.

options.name: Let It Go
options.description: Knowing is enough.

title: Pressing the Tail
description: You press the intimidated spy for more details. 'Why does Silas want me watched?' He stammers, 'He... he was scared after you left with that... humming thing. Said you might bring trouble back to him.'

options.name: Let Spy Go
options.description: Release him.

options.name: Silence Spy Permanently?
options.description: Ensure he can't report back.

title: Spy Defeated
description: You defeat the spy. Searching him reveals a few coins (1d8 GP) and perhaps a note from his employer (Silas?) confirming his task.

options.name: Loot Body
options.description: Take his belongings.

options.name: Leave Body, Flee Scene
options.description: Get away before guards arrive.

title: Defeated by Spy
description: The hired spy manages to defeat you, perhaps using poison or a cheap trick. He likely reports your location and condition to his employer before disappearing.

options.name: Wake Up Later (Injured)
options.description: Regain consciousness, possibly robbed.

title: Leaving Apothecary (Looted)
description: You slip back out of the apothecary shop with your stolen goods (potions, herbs, antitoxin, or strongbox contents).

options.name: Return to Safe Spot
options.description: Go back to your inn or hiding place.

options.name: Find Fence to Sell Loot
options.description: Try to sell the stolen items.

options.name: Leave Nestlebrook
options.description: Get out of town.

title: Apothecary Strongbox Contents
description: The strongbox opens! Inside, you find a significant amount of coin (5d10 GP) and a small pouch of rare alchemical ingredients.

options.name: Take Contents and Leave
options.description: Secure the loot and exit the shop.

title: Strongbox Lock Fails
description: You fail to pick the strongbox lock.

options.name: Try Forcing It?
options.description: Attempt to smash it open.

options.name: Leave It, Search Elsewhere/Leave
options.description: Give up on the box.

title: Forcing Strongbox (Noisy)
description: You smash the strongbox open! It reveals its contents (5d10 GP, rare ingredients). The noise, however, definitely alerted the owner upstairs!

options.name: Grab Loot and Flee!
options.description: Take the contents and run out immediately.

title: Apothecary Till Coins Taken
description: You pocket the small amount of silver and copper from the apothecary's till.

options.name: Search Rest of Shop
options.description: Look for more valuable items.

options.name: Leave Shop
options.description: Exit quietly.

title: Fleeing Noisy Apothecary Heist
description: Grabbing the loot after making noise, you bolt out of the apothecary shop just as you hear the owner shouting or coming downstairs. You escape into the night.

options.name: Escape into Alleys/Streets
options.description: Try to lose any potential pursuit.

title: Apothecary Owner Confrontation
description: The apothecary owner, an elderly but spry human, confronts you in the shop, alerted by the noise. 'Thief! Get out of my shop!' They might be armed with a pestle or try to raise the alarm.

options.name: Fight the Owner
options.description: Engage the apothecary.

options.name: Attempt to Flee Past Owner
options.description: Try to run out.

options.name: Try to Surrender/Talk Down
options.description: Attempt diplomacy.

title: Task: Shadowthistle Roots
description: You agree to fetch three Shadowthistle roots from the old Nestlebrook graveyard for Elara in exchange for healing.

options.name: Go to Graveyard
options.description: Head towards the town graveyard.

title: Guard Escort (Healer)
description: The guard helps you to the small shrine where the acolyte tends to your wounds (perhaps for a small mandatory donation the guard covers or waves off).

options.name: Healed, Questioned by Guard
options.description: Once tended to, the guard will likely ask more questions.

title: Guard Escort (Jail Infirmary)
description: The guard takes you to the jailhouse. Your wounds are given rudimentary attention before you are locked in a cell, arrested for vagrancy or suspicion.

options.name: Locked in Cell (Injured)
options.description: Begin imprisonment.

title: Stranger's Aid Received
description: Thanks to the kind stranger, you reach a safer location (Elara's, Inn steps). They bid you farewell. You need to recover properly.

options.name: Seek Healing (Elara/Inn)
options.description: Request aid from Elara or pay for room at inn.

options.name: Rest Where You Are Briefly
options.description: Catch your breath before deciding next move.

title: Rat Victory (Injured)
description: Despite your injuries, you defeat the giant rats in the alley.

options.name: Face New Thug
options.description: Unfortunately, more trouble arrives.

title: Rat Defeat (Injured) (Ending)
description: Already weakened, you are overwhelmed by the diseased rats. Their bites are numerous... darkness takes you. [Game Over]

options.name: The End
options.description: Your story ends here.

title: Second Thug Victory (Injured)
description: You defeat the opportunistic thug, despite being injured. You stand alone in the filthy alley, exhausted and wounded.

options.name: Loot Thug
options.description: Check his pockets.

options.name: Stagger Out Seeking Help
options.description: Try to find aid.

title: Second Thug Defeat (Ending)
description: Already injured, you stand no chance against the fresh opponent. The thug beats you unconscious and takes everything you have left. You wake later, stripped bare in the dirt. Survival seems unlikely. [Game Over? Or Severe Setback leading to 890]

options.name: Fade to Black (Ending)
options.description: Your story ends here.

options.name: Wake Up Robbed
options.description: Somehow conscious, but with nothing.

title: Waking on Docks - Alone
description: You look around the docks after waking from collapse. Whoever moved you or covered you is gone. You are alone.

options.name: Check Belongings
options.description: Were you robbed?

options.name: Try to Stand / Seek Help
options.description: Assess injuries.

title: Checking Pockets (Post-Collapse)
description: You check your pockets after waking on the docks. Your valuables are still there OR some items/coin are missing.

options.name: Valuables Intact
options.description: You weren't robbed.

options.name: Robbed!
options.description: Someone took advantage.

title: Clean Up Duty
description: You pay the 20 GP and spend an unpleasant half hour cleaning up the mess from your brawl with the dwarf. Afterwards, the barkeep grudgingly lets you leave.

options.name: Leave the Tavern
options.description: Exit.

title: Fighting the Barkeep

enemies.name: Angry Barkeep (Human/Other Race)
enemies.description: Protecting his establishment after the dwarf brawl.

description: You attack the barkeep to stop him calling the guards! He defends himself fiercely.
limitation: Barkeep fights defensively near bar. Victory leads to Node 1373. Defeat leads to Node 1374.

title: Snatching Inn Key
description: You manage to snatch the room key from the counter while the innkeeper is momentarily distracted. [Sleight of Hand DC 15 Success].

items.name: Inn Room Key
items.description: A key to a room at the Salty Siren.

options.name: Find the Room, Rob It?
options.description: Locate the corresponding room and see what's inside.

collectedItems.name: Inn Room Key
collectedItems.description: A key to a room at the Salty Siren.

options.name: Leave Inn with Key
options.description: Decide later what to do.

collectedItems.name: Inn Room Key
collectedItems.description: A key to a room at the Salty Siren.

title: Grabbing Unattended Bag
description: You casually lift the unattended bag near the fireplace. [Sleight of Hand DC 14 Success]. It feels moderately heavy.

options.name: Check Contents Discreetly
options.description: Find a corner or restroom to see what's inside.

options.name: Leave Inn with Bag
options.description: Exit before the owner returns.

title: Leaving Salty Siren
description: You leave the relatively calm Salty Siren Inn.

options.name: Return to Streets
options.description: Decide next move in town.

title: Joining Leaky Barrel Game
description: You join the rough dice game. The players eye your coin purse. It feels like cheating is rampant. [Play involves Luck/Insight checks, high risk of losing coin or starting fight].

options.name: Play a Few Rounds
options.description: Risk some coin.

options.name: Accuse Someone of Cheating
options.description: Risky move.

options.name: Leave Game Early
options.description: Decide it's too dangerous.

title: Watching for Cheats (Leaky Barrel)
description: Watching the game, you easily spot loaded dice being used by one player, while another seems to be subtly signalling an accomplice. This game is rigged.

options.name: Call Out Cheaters?
options.description: Expose them (likely starts fight).

options.name: Avoid the Game
options.description: Don't play.

options.name: Try to Ally with a Cheater?
options.description: Subtly approach one, offer partnership?

title: Attempting to Cheat (Leaky Barrel)
description:
You try to introduce your own loaded dice or palm chips in the rough game. [Sleight of Hand check DC 16 - high risk of being spotted].

Success: You manage a successful cheat, winning a small pot (1d6 GP?).

Failure: You are caught! 'Cheat!'

options.name: Take Winnings, Leave Game (If Success)
options.description: Get out before they notice pattern.

options.name: Caught! Fight/Flee (If Failure)
options.description: Deal with angry gamblers.

title: Robbing the Old Man
description: You easily lift the pouch from the drunk old man. Inside are only a few copper pieces (1d8 CP) and perhaps a sentimental trinket (worn locket?). A wave of pity or disgust might wash over you.

options.name: Keep Meager Loot
options.description: Take the coppers/trinket.

options.name: Return Pouch Quietly?
options.description: Feel guilty, slip it back.

title: Attacking Lagging Cultist

enemies.name: Unbound Agent (Isolated)

weapons.name: Curved Dagger
weapons.description: A simple but sharp curved knife.

enemies.description: Cultist surprised by your attack.

description: While partially bound (or having freed yourself), you attack the cultist who fell behind!
limitation: Must fight quickly before others notice. Victory leads to Node 1382. Defeat leads to Node 1383.

title: Using Cultist Hostage
description:
You manage to grab the lagging cultist, perhaps holding a shiv or weapon to their throat. 'Let me go, or they die!' you shout to the others. [Intimidation check DC 15].

Success: They hesitate, valuing their comrade's life (or fearing failure). They might let you go.

Failure: 'Loc demands sacrifice! Kill them!' They don't care and attack.

options.name: Escape with Hostage / Release and Flee (If Success)
options.description: Negotiate release or use hostage as shield to escape.

options.name: Fight Remaining Cultists (If Failure)
options.description: Your ploy failed.

title: Entering Lighthouse (Captive)
description: Bound, you are pushed through the lighthouse door by the Unbound. The gaunt servant nods silently. Inside, the air is cold. Stairs spiral up. The cultists seem eager to present you and the Tumbler to 'the Master'.

options.name: Taken Upstairs
options.description: Dragged up the spiral staircase.

options.name: Left in Entry Chamber?
options.description: Perhaps left guarded while leaders report?

title: Weakening Loc's Chains
description: 'The Gate weakens the structural bindings!' the cultist explains maniacally. 'The final ritual, fueled by blood and alignment, will shatter the remaining locks! Loc will be unbound!'

options.name: Look for Escape
options.description: Use distraction.

options.name: Ask About Your Role
options.description: 'Where does my blood fit in?'

title: Accepted as Acolyte?
description: Your feigned conversion seems successful, for now. The Unbound treat you less like a sacrifice and more like a potential, if untrusted, initiate. They might loosen your bonds slightly or explain more.

options.name: Play Along, Gather Intel
options.description: Learn their plans, look for weaknesses.

options.name: Look for Chance to Betray/Escape
options.description: Use their lowered guard against them.

title: Return to Elara (Moonpetal)
description: You return to Elara's cottage and present her with the faintly luminous Moonpetal Blossom.

items.name: Whispering Tumbler
items.description: Identified as a Key Fragment for Loc's prison.

items.name: Moonpetal Blossom
items.description: A faintly glowing flower from Whispering Falls.

options.name: Receive Information/Reward
options.description: Elara accepts the blossom.

title: Falls Clues Noted
description: You note the cryptic whispers ('key turns, tide rises, gate weakens') or the strange runes in the pool, seemingly linking the falls to the lighthouse events.

options.name: Gather Blossom, Return to Elara
options.description: Report findings with the flower.

title: Addressing Fey Presence
description: You speak aloud, addressing the unseen Fey presence in the grotto. A musical, echoing voice responds, 'You seek the bloom touched by the Outer Tide... brave, or foolish. Take what you need, mortal, but tread carefully. The balance shifts tonight.'

options.name: Ask About 'Outer Tide'/'Balance'
options.description: Inquire further.

options.name: Thank Presence, Gather Blossom
options.description: Heed the warning.

title: Touching the Pool Water
description: You dip your hand into the pool water. It's unnaturally cold, and you feel a brief flash of dizziness, seeing swirling stars or feeling the pull of the tide within your mind.

options.name: Withdraw Hand Quickly
options.description: React to the strange sensation.

options.name: Try Drinking the Water?
options.description: Risky action.

title: Pixie Directions?
description: You ask the pixies for directions to Whispering Falls. They giggle, point in multiple directions at once, then vanish, leaving you no wiser.

options.name: Continue Search Based on Instinct
options.description: Rely on Survival skill.

title: Pixie Tricks
description: The pixies playfully lead you on a merry chase through the woods, or perhaps try to tie your bootlaces together or steal a small, shiny object while you're distracted.

options.name: Ignore Them, Continue Search
options.description: Try to focus despite the annoyance.

options.name: Try to Catch/Scare Them Off
options.description: Attempt to deal with the pests.

title: Spider Defeated
description: You defeat the giant spider. Its carcass lies still in your camp.

options.name: Harvest Poison/Silk?
options.description: Try to extract venom or gather silk glands. [Survival/Nature check?].

options.name: Move Camp?
options.description: Decide to relocate after the fight.

options.name: Rest (Shaken)
options.description: Try to sleep despite the encounter.

title: Spider Defeat (Ending)
description: The giant spider's venom is potent. As paralysis creeps through your limbs, the spider cocoons you in silk. Your journey ends here, a meal for the forest's denizens. [Game Over]

options.name: The End
options.description: Your story ends here.

title: Glowing Mushrooms
description: The mushrooms emit a soft, pulsating light and the strange humming. [Nature/Arcana check DC 14]. Success: You recognize them as 'Feylights', edible and granting temporary darkvision OR they are 'Mindspores', dangerous if inhaled. Failure: Their properties are unknown.

options.name: Eat Feylights (If Success)
options.description: Gain temporary Darkvision.

options.name: Avoid Mindspores (If Success)
options.description: Leave the dangerous fungi alone.

options.name: Leave Them Alone
options.description: Don't risk eating unknown fungi.

title: Hidden Shrine
description: The hidden shrine features weathered carvings of nature spirits and resonating crystals embedded in stone. Touching a crystal causes it to hum louder, sending pleasant vibrations through you.

options.name: Meditate / Attune?
options.description: Spend time trying to connect with the shrine's energy.

options.name: Try to Take a Crystal?
options.description: Attempt to pry a crystal loose. [Risky?].

options.name: Leave Shrine
options.description: Return to camp.

title: Digging Signs
description: You examine the disturbed earth. It looks like someone was digging recently, perhaps burying something or excavating. The hole has been refilled, but poorly.

options.name: Dig It Up?
options.description: Excavate the spot to see what was buried.

options.name: Look for Tracks Leading Away
options.description: See who might have been digging.

options.name: Leave It Be
options.description: Don't disturb the site.

title: Investigating Burrow
description: Peering into the large burrow, you smell damp earth and something else... musky animal scent? Or faint decay? It seems recently used.

options.name: Enter Burrow Cautiously?
options.description: Crawl inside to explore. [Very Risky].

options.name: Listen at Entrance
options.description: Try to hear movement within.

options.name: Leave Burrow Alone
options.description: Avoid potential danger.

title: Snare Success
description: You retrieve the rabbit/bird caught in your snare. A welcome source of food.

items.name: Fresh Game
items.description: A caught rabbit or bird.

options.name: Continue to Elara
options.description: Proceed back.

title: Wandering Lost
description: Wandering lost in the woods, you stumble into: a territorial beast's lair OR a patch of quicksand OR eventually find the path/falls by sheer luck.

options.name: Encounter Beast
options.description: Fight or flee.

options.name: Deal with Quicksand
options.description: Try to escape the hazard.

options.name: Find the Falls/Path
options.description: Luck is with you.

title: Following Mystery Boat
description: You attempt to follow the mysterious boat heading towards Whispering Shoals. [Requires own boat & skill check - Sailing/Navigation?]. Success: You manage to tail them discreetly. Failure: You lose them in the darkness or run aground.

options.name: Observe Their Destination (If Success)
options.description: See if they land at a hidden cove or meet someone.

options.name: Lost Them / Ran Aground (If Failure)
options.description: Pursuit failed. Deal with consequences.

title: Noting Mystery Boat
description: You commit the appearance of the small, fast fishing vessel to memory. Maybe you can identify it later or ask around.

options.name: Return Focus to Docks/Town
options.description: Continue observations or move on.

title: Faction Pin Found
description: The symbol on the cloak pin confirms either Unbound (serpent) or Keeper (keyhole) presence and activity under the piers recently.

options.name: Be More Wary
options.description: Assume faction members are nearby.

options.name: Report Finding?
options.description: Tell Elara or the opposing faction?

title: Leaving Under-Pier Area
description: Having investigated under the pier (and possibly found something or not), you emerge back onto the main dock area.

options.name: Continue Dock Exploration
options.description: Look for other opportunities.

title: Soggy Coins Found
description: You retrieve the few soggy gold pieces from the waterproof pouch.

options.name: Try to Read Note
options.description: Examine the waterlogged note also in the pouch.

options.name: Leave Under Pier
options.description: Exit the area.

title: Deciphering Waterlogged Note
description: You carefully try to read the faded, waterlogged note. [Investigation check DC 15]. Success: You make out words like 'rendezvous', 'Squid', 'tide's turn', 'payment'. Failure: The ink is too blurred to read.

options.name: Connect to Smuggler 'Squid' (If Success)
options.description: This seems related to Finnigan's escape plan.

options.name: Keep Note Fragment (If Failure)
options.description: Maybe it will make sense later.

options.name: Discard Note
options.description: Useless.

title: Sensitive Package Delivery
description: The Leaky Barrel barkeep hands you a small, heavy, cloth-wrapped package. 'Take this to the Salty Dog tavern, ask for 'Scar'. Don't open it. Don't get caught. 20 Silver on return.'

items.name: Sensitive Package
items.description: A heavy, cloth-wrapped package of unknown contents.

options.name: Deliver Package as Instructed
options.description: Head towards the Salty Dog tavern.

options.name: Peek Inside Package? (Risky)
options.description: Try to see what you're carrying.

options.name: Abandon Delivery
options.description: Decide it's too suspicious. Ditch the package?

title: Discouraging Salty Dogs
description: The Leaky Barrel barkeep wants you to 'discourage' Salty Dog members from encroaching on their turf (likely near the fish market or rival tavern). This means intimidation or violence against the other gang.

options.name: Find and Confront Salty Dogs
options.description: Seek them out.

options.name: Report Back (Refuse Job)
options.description: Tell the barkeep you won't do it.

title: Investigating Smuggler 'Squid'
description: You start asking around the docks and shady taverns about the smuggler known as 'Squid'. People are tight-lipped, but eventually, someone points you towards Patch the halfling fence or mentions midnight meetings under the old pier.

options.name: Ask Patch About Squid
options.description: See if the fence knows him.

options.name: Stake Out Old Pier at Midnight
options.description: Try to catch Squid during a meeting.

options.name: Give Up Search
options.description: Too difficult to find him.

title: Investigating Kraken's Crew (Bounty)
description: You need proof of the Kraken's Crew's illegal activities for the bounty. This might involve witnessing extortion, finding smuggled goods in their warehouse, or catching them in the act of violence.

options.name: Stake Out Warehouse/Alleys
options.description: Watch for illegal activity.

options.name: Attempt Infiltration of Warehouse
options.description: Break in to find evidence.

options.name: Try to Provoke Them?
options.description: Get them to commit a crime witnessed by guards?

options.name: Give Up on Bounty
options.description: Too dangerous or difficult.

title: Planning Merchant House Heist
description: You plan the burglary of the prosperous merchant's house. It looks large, possibly with guards or dogs, but maybe less secure than official buildings.

options.name: Scout for Entry Points/Guard Patterns
options.description: Observe the house.

options.name: Attempt Night Infiltration
options.description: Try breaking in after dark.

title: Guard Office Infiltration
description: You attempt to sneak into the jailhouse and towards the Guard Captain's office. [Very High DC Stealth/Thieves' Tools checks required for multiple stages - hallway, office door, evidence locker].

options.name: Reach Office Undetected
options.description: Successfully bypass initial security.

options.name: Get Caught!
options.description: Spotted by a guard!

title: Diversion for Guard Office Heist
description: You try to create a diversion elsewhere in town (fire? brawl?) to draw guards away from the jailhouse office.

options.name: Diversion Succeeds, Attempt Infiltration
options.description: Guards seem drawn away. Try entering now.

options.name: Diversion Fails / Attracts Wrong Attention
options.description: Doesn't work or brings more guards.

title: Lighthouse Base Reached (w/ Brynn)
description: You and Brynn reach the base of the lighthouse undetected. What's the entry plan?

options.name: Try Main Door (Knock/Pick)
options.description: Attempt the front entrance.

options.name: Look for Cellar Grate
options.description: Search for the alternate entrance.

options.name: Attempt to Climb?
options.description: Assess climbing options.

title: Spotted Approaching Lighthouse (w/ Brynn)
description: Your stealthy approach fails! A figure (Servant? Cultist?) spots you and Brynn from the lighthouse.

options.name: Charge the Entrance
options.description: Attack before they raise alarm.

options.name: Take Cover, Assess Threat
options.description: Hide and see who responds.

options.name: Retreat
options.description: Abandon the stealth approach.

title: Servant Answers (w/ Brynn)
description: The gaunt servant opens the door, his blank eyes flicking between you and Brynn. 'Yes?'

options.name: State Business (Job/Info)
options.description: Explain why you are here.

options.name: Intimidate/Force Entry
options.description: Use Brynn's presence to push past.

title: Lighthouse No Answer/Hostile (w/ Brynn)
description: Your knock goes unanswered, or a voice from within shouts threats ('Go away!', 'Trespassers will be destroyed!').

options.name: Attempt Forced Entry (Brynn Helps?)
options.description: Try breaking down door or picking lock.

options.name: Look for Other Entrance
options.description: Check grate/climbing options.

options.name: Leave
options.description: Decide against forced entry.

title: Watching Brynn vs Keeper
description: You watch as Brynn engages Keeper Marius. She's skilled, but Marius is powerful and experienced. The outcome is uncertain.

options.name: Intervene (Help Brynn)
options.description: Join the fight.

options.name: Brynn Wins!
options.description: She manages to defeat Marius.

options.name: Brynn Loses!
options.description: Marius defeats her. Your turn?

title: Executing Silas Heist (w/ Brynn)
description: You proceed with the plan. You attempt entry (front door, grate?) while Brynn stands lookout.

options.name: Attempt Entry (Stealth)
options.description: Try picking lock or using grate.

title: Executing Reliquary Heist (Diversion)
description: Brynn heads off to create a major diversion on the docks. Once the chaos starts, you need to quickly board the 'Sea Serpent' and grab the Reliquary.

options.name: Await Diversion, Make Move
options.description: Wait for the chaos, then act.

title: Executing Reliquary Heist (Ambush)
description: You and Brynn set an ambush for the guards transferring the Reliquary. As they approach, Brynn engages them while you focus on securing the box.

options.name: Launch Ambush
options.description: Spring the trap.

title: Attempting Heist Solo
description: Without Brynn's help, you decide to attempt the heist on Silas or the Reliquary alone.

options.name: Target Silas's Shop (Solo)
options.description: Plan the pawn shop burglary.

options.name: Target Reliquary (Solo)
options.description: Plan the Reliquary interception.

title: Dismissing Brynn
description: You tell Brynn the deal is off or her services are no longer needed. She collects her initial payment (40 GP) and leaves. You are on your own again.

options.name: Proceed Solo
options.description: Continue your plans alone.

title: Captain's Favor (Items)
description: Leveraging your bribe, you ask the Guard Captain to return your confiscated items, especially the strange device (Tumbler). 'Alright,' the captain sighs, retrieving them from a lockbox. 'Take it. And stay out of trouble.'

options.name: Retrieve Items, Leave Town
options.description: Get your gear back and escape Nestlebrook.

options.name: Retrieve Items, Continue Investigations
options.description: Use your freedom and gear to pursue leads.

title: Captain's Info
description: You ask the bribed Guard Captain about the factions or lighthouse. 'Just whispers,' the captain says gruffly. 'Cultists meetin' at the lighthouse. That armored merc asking questions. Scholar up there is trouble. That's all I know. Now get out.'

options.name: Use Information, Leave Town
options.description: Take the info and escape.

options.name: Use Information, Continue Investigations
options.description: Act on the captain's intel.

title: Arrival at New Port
description: Your ship docks at [New Port - e.g., bustling Port Azure]. You disembark, regret heavy in your gut. Now you must find passage back north to Nestlebrook to deal with the unfinished business of the Tumbler.

options.name: Seek Passage Back North
options.description: Inquire at the docks for ships heading towards Nestlebrook.

options.name: Explore Port Azure Briefly?
options.description: Gather supplies or info here first?

title: Reconsidering Departure
description: Elara's/Silas's/Finnigan's final words resonate. Leaving feels wrong. You decide not to board the ship, letting it sail without you. The mysteries (and dangers) of Nestlebrook still hold you.

options.name: Return to Investigations
options.description: Focus on the Lighthouse, Factions, or Tumbler.

title: Sharing Faction Intel
description: You decide to share your knowledge about one faction's identity or plans with the opposing side.

options.name: Tell Elara about Keeper/Valerius's Plans
options.description: Inform the scholar.

options.name: Tell Keeper about Unbound/Valerius's Plans
options.description: Inform Marius.

options.name: Tell Unbound about Keeper/Valerius's Plans
options.description: Inform the cultists.

title: Catching Silas in a Lie
description: You confront Silas with conflicting information you possess (e.g., knowing he *did* deal with Unbound). He stammers, caught. 'Alright, alright! Maybe I fenced one small thing for them! Once! They scare me!'

options.name: Press for More Details Now
options.description: He's off balance. Demand more info.

options.name: Use This as Leverage
options.description: Extort him or force cooperation.

title: Guard Duty (Silas)
description: You honor your deal, keeping watch near Silas's shop. Do the Unbound or the Keeper show up?

options.name: Unbound Arrive!
options.description: Cultists approach the shop.

options.name: Keeper Arrives!
options.description: Marius approaches the shop.

options.name: Nothing Happens
options.description: Your watch is uneventful. Silas is relieved.

title: Betraying Silas
description: You take Silas's payment or information but have no intention of actually protecting him. You leave him to face the factions alone.

options.name: Leave Nestlebrook
options.description: Get out of town.

options.name: Continue Investigations
options.description: Use the ill-gotten gains/info.

title: Searching Silas's Cellar
description: Searching the cluttered cellar: You find mostly junk, but uncover a hidden compartment containing the Whispering Tumbler OR several pouches of gold (50 GP).

options.name: Take the Tumbler!
options.description: Retrieve the artifact.

collectedItems.name: Whispering Tumbler
collectedItems.description: A small, complex metal device. Stolen back!

options.name: Take the Gold!
options.description: Grab the hidden stash.

options.name: Find Nothing Valuable
options.description: The cellar yields nothing.

title: Ascending from Silas's Cellar
description: You head up the stairs from Silas's cellar into the main shop.

options.name: Enter Main Shop Stealthily
options.description: Emerge into the store.

title: Checking Silas's Cellar for Traps
description: You check the cellar for traps. [Perception DC 13]. Success: You spot a tripwire near the stairs OR a pressure plate under some junk. Failure: No traps detected.

options.name: Avoid/Disable Trap (If Found)
options.description: Bypass the hazard.

options.name: Proceed
options.description: Continue searching or ascend.

title: Finding Silas's Strongbox
description: In the back room, hidden under a pile of ledgers, you find Silas's strongbox.

options.name: Attempt to Pick Lock
options.description: [Thieves' Tools DC 16?].

options.name: Try to Take Whole Box?
options.description: Attempt to carry it out.

title: Silas Heist Success!
description: You successfully retrieve the Whispering Tumbler OR significant valuables from Silas's shop!

options.name: Escape the Shop
options.description: Get out before Silas returns or raises alarm.

title: Reading Silas's Ledger
description: Scanning the ledger reveals coded entries hinting at dealings with 'Serpents' (Unbound?), 'Keyhole' (Keeper?), and shipments to 'V' (Valerius?). It confirms his involvement.

items.name: Silas's Ledger
items.description: A ledger with coded entries about factions.

options.name: Take Ledger as Proof/Info
options.description: Steal the ledger.

options.name: Leave Ledger, Search Elsewhere
options.description: Look for Tumbler/valuables.

title: Taking Other Pawned Goods
description: Unable to find the Tumbler easily, you grab some other valuable-looking items from Silas's shelves - perhaps a silver candlestick, a spyglass, or a minor magic trinket.

options.name: Escape with Loot
options.description: Leave the shop.

title: Going Upstairs (Silas's)
description: You cautiously head upstairs into what are likely Silas's living quarters. It's dimly lit, cramped, and personal.

options.name: Search Living Quarters
options.description: Look for hidden valuables or the Tumbler. [Risk encountering Silas].

options.name: Encounter Silas!
options.description: He's here!

options.name: Retreat Downstairs
options.description: Too risky.

title: Harbormaster Office Infiltration
description: You attempt to break into the harbormaster's office at night. [Stealth/Thieves' Tools checks]. Success: You get inside. Failure: Alarm raised / Guard spots you.

options.name: Search Office (If Success)
options.description: Look for keys and the lockbox.

options.name: Caught! (If Failure)
options.description: Deal with guards.

title: Pickpocketing Harbormaster
description: You attempt to lift the keys from the harbormaster during his daily rounds. [High DC Sleight of Hand check DC 17]. Success: You get the keys! Failure: He catches you!

options.name: Got the Keys! (If Success)
options.description: Now plan to use them on the office/lockbox.

collectedItems.name: Harbormaster's Keys
collectedItems.description: Keys to the harbormaster's office and lockbox.

options.name: Caught! (If Failure)
options.description: Face the harbormaster and guards.

title: Harbormaster Residence Infiltration
description: You break into the harbormaster's home at night, looking for his keys. [Stealth/Thieves' Tools checks]. Success: Find keys! Failure: Wake occupants / Caught.

options.name: Find Keys (If Success)
options.description: Got them!

collectedItems.name: Harbormaster's Keys
collectedItems.description: Keys to the harbormaster's office and lockbox.

options.name: Caught! (If Failure)
options.description: Face homeowner/guards.

title: Bribing Shipment Guards
description: You approach the poorly paid guards watching Borin's rare wood shipment, offering a bribe to look the other way while you take some. [Persuasion check DC 12]. Success: They accept! Failure: They refuse, possibly raise alarm.

options.name: Steal Wood (If Success)
options.description: Take some valuable timber.

options.name: Bribe Fails
options.description: Need another plan.

title: Ambushing Wood Cart
description: You ambush the cart delivering Borin's wood. Deal with the driver and any guards.

options.name: Fight Driver/Guards
options.description: [Combat].

title: Wood Storage Heist
description: You wait until the wood is delivered, then attempt to sneak into Borin's storage area (warehouse? yard?) to steal some.

options.name: Infiltrate Storage
options.description: [Stealth/Thieves' Tools checks].

title: Smuggler's Boat
description: You pay Squid the 10 GP and climb into his small, fast boat hidden under the pier. He pushes off silently into the darkness, heading out of the harbor.

options.name: Escape Nestlebrook (Ending?)
options.description: You are smuggled out of town. [Branch End]

options.name: Ask Squid About Destination/Trouble
options.description: Inquire about the journey.

title: Haggling with Smuggler
description: You try to haggle with Squid. He scoffs. 'Ten gold or swim. Finnigan's word ain't collateral.'

options.name: Pay 10 GP
options.description: Agree to his price.

options.name: Refuse
options.description: Turn down the offer.

title: Refusing Smuggler
description: You refuse Squid's price or decide not to trust him. He shrugs and melts back into the shadows, leaving you on the pier.

options.name: Find Another Way Out
options.description: Look for other ships/routes.

options.name: Confront Finnigan?
options.description: Go back to the informant.

title: Confronting Finnigan (Smuggler)
description: You find Ratty Finnigan and confront him about the smuggler deal falling through or being untrustworthy. He looks nervous. 'Squid's reliable... usually! Maybe he was spooked?'

options.name: Demand Money Back (If Paid Finnigan)
options.description: Try to get a refund.

options.name: Threaten Finnigan?
options.description: Intimidate him for setting you up.

options.name: Leave It
options.description: Not worth the trouble.

title: Picking Reliquary Lock
description: You attempt to pick the complex lock on the lead-lined Reliquary box. [High DC Thieves' Tools check DC 18? Potential magical trap?]. Success: The lock opens! Failure: Lock holds / Trap triggers!

options.name: Open Box (If Success)
options.description: Reveal the contents.

options.name: Trap Triggered! (If Failure)
options.description: Deal with magical alarm, poison needle, etc.

options.name: Give Up, Try Taking Box (If Failure)
options.description: Can't open it here.

title: Stealing the Reliquary Box
description: You attempt to carry the heavy, lead-lined Reliquary box off the ship stealthily. It's awkward and slows you down significantly. [Stealth check with Disadvantage?].

options.name: Escape Ship with Box (If Success)
options.description: Make it off the ship undetected.

collectedItems.name: Reliquary Box
collectedItems.description: A heavy, lead-lined box covered in wards.

options.name: Caught Due to Slowness/Noise (If Failure)
options.description: Guards spot you struggling with the box.

title: Aborting Reliquary Heist
description: Finding the Reliquary too well-protected, locked, or heavy, you decide to abort the heist attempt.

options.name: Leave the Ship Stealthily
options.description: Try to exit undetected.

title: Fighting Ship Guards
description: Alerted guards on the 'Sea Serpent' confront you!

options.name: Engage Guards
options.description: [Combat - likely 2-4 guards].

title: Making Move During Diversion
description: While the dockside diversion (fire, brawl, alarm) has the guards' attention, you quickly try to board the 'Sea Serpent' or grab the Reliquary if it's being moved.

options.name: Attempt Ship Infiltration
options.description: Sneak aboard.

options.name: Attempt Reliquary Snatch
options.description: Grab the box.

options.name: Diversion Ends Too Soon / Guards Remain
options.description: Not all guards were distracted.

title: Fire Diversion Problems
description: The fire you started spreads rapidly, threatening nearby ships or buildings! It draws far more attention than intended, including many guards and angry dockworkers.

options.name: Abort Heist, Flee Scene
options.description: Get away before you're implicated.

title: Caught in Dock Brawl
description: Trying to use the brawl as a diversion, you get too close and are accidentally (or intentionally) dragged into the fight!

options.name: Fight Your Way Out
options.description: [Combat vs random sailors/gang members].

title: Diversion Fails (Reliquary)
description: Your diversion attempt fails to sufficiently distract the guards on the 'Sea Serpent', or they quickly realize it's a false alarm. The opportunity is lost.

options.name: Abort Heist
options.description: Plan failed.

title: Reliquary Guard Ambush Victory
description: You (and Brynn, if present) defeat the guards escorting the Reliquary!

options.name: Secure the Reliquary Box
options.description: Attempt to take the heavy box.

options.name: Loot Guards
options.description: Check their bodies quickly.

options.name: Flee Before Reinforcements
options.description: Get away from the scene.

title: Reliquary Guard Ambush Defeat
description: The well-trained ship guards overwhelm you (and Brynn, if present). You are captured after the failed ambush.

options.name: Imprisoned
options.description: Taken into custody.

title: Escaped with Reliquary!
description: You successfully escape from the docks with the heavy, lead-lined Reliquary box!

items.name: Reliquary Box
items.description: A heavy, lead-lined box covered in wards.

options.name: Find Safe Place to Open Box
options.description: Get somewhere secure to examine your prize.

options.name: Deliver Box to Elara? (If Tasked)
options.description: Take it to the scholar.

options.name: Try to Sell Box Unopened?
options.description: Find a fence who buys mysteries.

options.name: Leave Nestlebrook with Box
options.description: Get out of town.

title: Leaving Warehouse Area
description: You decide against confronting the Unbound in the warehouse and leave the area.

options.name: Report Findings (Keeper/Elara)
options.description: Share what you saw/heard.

options.name: Return to Docks/Town Center
options.description: Decide next steps.

title: Unbound Plans Overheard
description: You overheard useful details about the Unbound plans - likely concerning the ritual, high tide, the lighthouse alignment, their leader Kaelen, or their awareness of the Keeper.

options.name: Report Information (Keeper/Elara)
options.description: Share the intel.

options.name: Act on Information (Go to Lighthouse?)
options.description: Head towards their meeting place.

options.name: Leave Area
options.description: Decide not to get involved.

title: Stealing Tavern Scraps
description: You manage to steal some leftover bread or meat scraps from the tavern kitchen.

options.name: Eat Food, Leave Tavern
options.description: Consume the scraps and exit.

title: Splitting Co-op Loot
description: You meet your cloaked partner. They give you / you give them half the proceeds: ~37 GP each. They keep the Jade Frog (or you do, depending on agreement/who grabbed what). 'Pleasure,' they might say, before vanishing.

options.name: Part Ways Amicably
options.description: Successful, if temporary, partnership.

options.name: Try to Follow Partner?
options.description: See where they go.

title: Attacking Trapped Cultist
description: You attack the Unbound cultist caught in your trap. They are helpless or at a severe disadvantage. [Combat likely very short].

options.name: Cultist Defeated
options.description: Finish them off.

title: Waiting for Cultist Backup
description: You wait, hidden, after trapping one cultist (or seeking your treacherous partner). Soon, the other two Unbound agents arrive, looking for their companion OR your partner confronts you.

options.name: Ambush Remaining Cultists
options.description: Attack the other two.

options.name: Confront Partner (Demand Share/Fight)
options.description: Deal with the betrayal.

options.name: Attempt to Slip Away
options.description: Try to escape while they are focused on their trapped comrade/argument.

title: Seeking Elara (Shards)
description: You eventually return to Nestlebrook and show the obsidian shards to Elara.

items.name: Obsidian Shards (x3)
items.description: Polished obsidian shards, possibly runic or magical.

options.name: Elara Examines Shards
options.description: 'Ah, soul shards... or fragments of shadow essence. Used in dark rituals. Where did you find these?'

title: Observing Unbound Ritual
description: Watching the ritual: They chant around an altar, focusing energy onto a specific point or object (maybe the Tumbler?). The air crackles, shadows deepen. It seems like a summoning or empowering ritual.

options.name: Attempt to Disrupt Ritual
options.description: Interfere now.

options.name: Wait for Climax / Weak Point
options.description: Continue observing.

title: Observing Unbound Forge
description: Watching the forge: Unbound smiths hammer metal into wicked-looking blades and armor pieces, quenching them in strange liquids. They seem to be arming themselves for a larger conflict.

options.name: Attempt Sabotage (Quench Liquid?)
options.description: Try to ruin their work.

options.name: Note Armaments, Retreat
options.description: Gather intel and leave.

title: Observing Unbound Prisoners
description: Watching the prisoners: They are local villagers or perhaps captured travelers, looking terrified. The Unbound seem to be ignoring them for now, possibly saving them for sacrifice.

options.name: Attempt Rescue
options.description: Try to free the prisoners.

options.name: Try to Signal Prisoners?
options.description: Attempt communication discreetly.

options.name: Retreat, Report Findings?
options.description: Leave and tell guards/Keeper?

title: Causing Rockfall
description: You manage to dislodge rocks near the cavern ceiling! Rubble cascades down, causing chaos among the Unbound, potentially blocking part of the cavern or injuring some.

options.name: Use Chaos to Attack/Escape/Free Prisoners
options.description: Take advantage of the confusion.

options.name: Rockfall Traps You?
options.description: You miscalculated, blocking your own exit or causing harm.

title: Extinguishing Lights
description: You manage to douse the braziers or torches, plunging the cavern into near-total darkness! Confused shouts erupt from the Unbound.

options.name: Use Darkness to Escape
options.description: Slip out unnoticed.

options.name: Use Darkness to Attack (Advantage?)
options.description: Strike while they are blind.

options.name: Use Darkness to Free Prisoners
options.description: Navigate to the cages.

title: Freeing Prisoners
description: You sneak towards the cages holding the prisoners. You need to open the locks. [Thieves' Tools DC 14]. Success: Cages open! Failure: Fail to open, alert guards.

options.name: Lead Prisoners to Escape (If Success)
options.description: Guide them out of the cavern.

options.name: Alert Guards (If Failure)
options.description: Cultists converge!

title: Targeting Unbound Leader
description: You focus on the apparent leader, Kaelen - perhaps trying a ranged attack, a stealth takedown, or drawing their attention for a direct confrontation.

options.name: Attempt Ranged Attack (If Able)
options.description: Shoot arrow/bolt/spell.

options.name: Attempt Stealth Takedown
options.description: Try to sneak up and assassinate/subdue. [High DC Stealth/Attack].

options.name: Challenge Leader Directly
options.description: Call them out.

title: Stealing Unbound Chest
description: You attempt to sneak towards the chest seen in the Unbound cavern and steal it. [Stealth check, possibly Strength to carry].

options.name: Successfully Steal Chest, Escape
options.description: Get away with the chest!

options.name: Get Caught!
options.description: Spotted trying to take the chest.

title: Retrieving Tumbler (Altar)
description: The Key Fragment (Tumbler) rests on the altar! You must get past the chanting cultists to retrieve it.

options.name: Attempt Stealth Grab
options.description: Try to sneak up and snatch it. [High DC Stealth/Sleight of Hand].

options.name: Create Diversion, Then Grab
options.description: Cause chaos elsewhere first.

options.name: Fight Your Way to Altar
options.description: Direct assault.

title: Cave Guard Defeated
description: You defeat the Unbound guard at the cave entrance. The passage lies open, but reinforcements might be coming.

options.name: Enter Cave Quickly
options.description: Proceed inside.

options.name: Loot Guard, Then Enter
options.description: Quickly check pockets.

options.name: Retreat Now
options.description: Decide against entering.

title: Cave Guard Defeat / Ambush Defeat
description: The Unbound guard(s) at the cave entrance defeat you. You are captured and dragged inside their lair.

options.name: Become Prisoner
options.description: Taken captive by the Unbound.

title: Pushing Past Cave Guard
description: Using the guard's momentary confusion from your bluff, you dart past him deeper into the cave passage!

options.name: Continue Deeper
options.description: Proceed further in.

options.name: Guard Pursues?
options.description: He might recover and chase you.

title: Cave Ambush Victory
description: You successfully ambush and defeat the Unbound sentries who emerged from the cave.

options.name: Enter Cave Now
options.description: Proceed inside.

options.name: Loot Bodies First
options.description: Check their pockets.

options.name: Wait for More?
options.description: See if others emerge.

title: Arrival in Oakhaven (Ending)
description: After a long journey, you arrive in the mountain settlement of Oakhaven. It's larger than Nestlebrook, perhaps offering new opportunities or dangers far from the coast and the Tumbler's immediate influence. [Branch End - New Area]

options.name: Explore Oakhaven
options.description: Begin a new chapter.

title: Road Encounter (Oakhaven)
description: During your journey to Oakhaven, you encounter: a territorial Griffon OR a travelling merchant caravan OR signs of recent avalanche/rockslide blocking the path.

options.name: Deal with Griffon
options.description: Fight or avoid.

options.name: Interact with Caravan
options.description: Trade or seek passage?

options.name: Find Way Around Obstacle
options.description: Navigate the rockslide.

title: Following Prospectors (Coast)
description: You follow the prospectors back down towards the coast. They eventually reach Nestlebrook and head straight for the Drunken Sailor tavern.

options.name: Follow into Tavern
options.description: See who they talk to.

options.name: Confront Them Now
options.description: Approach them outside the tavern.

options.name: Let Them Go
options.description: End the pursuit.

title: Examining Stolen Loot (Silas)
description: Checking what you stole from Silas: Keys (likely to shop/strongbox?), Pouch (1d10 GP), OR the Tumbler itself!

options.name: Use Keys?
options.description: Return to Silas's shop to use them?

options.name: Pocket Coin/Tumbler
options.description: Keep the loot.

title: Bluffing Diversion
description: You try to bluff your way out of trouble after the diversion. [Deception check vs Guardian/Barkeep Insight]. Success: They accept your excuse ('Accident!', 'Saw a rat!'). Failure: They don't buy it, demand truth or call guards.

options.name: Bluff Succeeds, Slip Away
options.description: Use the chance to leave.

options.name: Bluff Fails, Face Consequences
options.description: Deal with angry Guardian/Barkeep.

title: Consequences of Diversion
description: Your failed diversion or bluff has angered the Guardian or Barkeep.

options.name: Fight Them
options.description: Engage whoever is angry.

options.name: Attempt to Flee Tavern
options.description: Run for it.

title: Guardian Intercepts Unbound
description: Despite your attempted distraction, Marius spots the Unbound leaving and moves swiftly to intercept them! A fight breaks out near the tavern exit between the Keeper and the cultists.

options.name: Help the Guardian?
options.description: Side with Marius.

options.name: Help the Unbound?
options.description: Side with the cultists.

options.name: Slip Away During Fight
options.description: Use the battle as cover to escape.

title: Looting the Guardian
description: Searching the defeated Keeper Marius yields his Guardian Axe, possibly a holy symbol or writ of his order, and maybe the Tumbler (if he had recovered it).

options.name: Take Loot
options.description: Collect the powerful items.

title: Deciding Marius's Fate
description: Keeper Marius lies defeated at your feet. Do you finish him off, or leave him unconscious?

options.name: Spare Him
options.description: Leave him alive, possibly to recover and pursue you later.

options.name: Kill Him (Ending?)
options.description: Ensure he won't be a threat. Killing a Keeper may have dire consequences or attract more powerful foes. [Potential Ending/Branch Shift]

title: Cooperating with Keeper
description: You tell Keeper Marius everything you know about the Tumbler, the Unbound, Valerius, and the lighthouse. He listens intently. 'Your information may prove useful. For your cooperation, perhaps... your interference can be overlooked this time. But stay out of Keeper business.' He might release you, or keep you confined but safe.

options.name: Released with Warning
options.description: He lets you go.

options.name: Remain Prisoner (Protected?)
options.description: He keeps you locked up, possibly for your own safety or as witness.

title: Refusing Keeper
description: 'Defiance is unwise,' Marius states coldly. 'You will remain here until I have dealt with the Unbound threat. Then your fate will be decided.' He leaves you bound.

options.name: Remain Captive
options.description: Await his return or further events.

title: Escape Attempt (Keeper Captive)
description: While Marius is absent (or Valerius hasn't arrived), you work at your bonds or look for weaknesses in your confinement. [Dex check DC 15?]. Success: You get free! Failure: Bonds hold / Alert guard.

options.name: Escape! (If Success)
options.description: You are free inside the Keeper's makeshift prison / Lighthouse. Sneak out?

options.name: Remain Captive (If Failure)
options.description: Escape attempt fails.

title: Assaulting Silas's Shop (w/ Unbound)
description: You and the Unbound cultists launch a direct assault on Silas's pawn shop. Combat ensues against Silas, and possibly any hidden traps or guards he might have.

options.name: Fight Silas
options.description: [Combat with Unbound allies].

title: Stealth Heist (w/ Unbound)
description: You convince the Unbound to let you try a stealthy approach on Silas's shop first. They agree to wait outside as backup.

options.name: Attempt Infiltration
options.description: Try breaking into Silas's shop.

title: Betraying Unbound (Silas Heist)
description: Instead of helping the Unbound attack Silas, you warn the pawnbroker OR alert Keeper Marius to the Unbound's plan.

options.name: Warn Silas
options.description: Tell Silas the Unbound are coming.

options.name: Warn Marius
options.description: Tell the Keeper about the planned attack.

title: Ambushing the Keeper (w/ Unbound)
description: You join the Unbound cultists in ambushing Keeper Marius. It's a desperate fight against a powerful opponent.

options.name: Fight Marius
options.description: [Combat with Unbound allies].

title: Acting as Bait (Keeper Ambush)
description: You act as bait, approaching Marius seemingly alone to lure him into the Unbound's ambush position.

options.name: Lure Succeeds, Ambush Sprung
options.description: Marius walks into the trap!

options.name: Marius Detects Trap / Is Wary
options.description: He senses the ambush!

title: Warning Marius (Betray Unbound)
description: You find Keeper Marius and warn him about the Unbound's planned ambush.

options.name: Marius Prepares Counter-Ambush?
options.description: He might use the information to turn the tables.

options.name: Marius Dismisses Warning / Still Distrusts You?
options.description: He doesn't believe you or acts independently.

title: Forcing Lighthouse Door (w/ Unbound)
description: You and the Unbound cultists attack the main door of the lighthouse, attempting to break it down.

options.name: Door Breached!
options.description: Enter the lighthouse.

options.name: Resistance from Within!
options.description: Servant or traps repel the assault.

title: Using Grate Entrance (w/ Unbound)
description: You lead the Unbound to the cellar grate. Together, you manage to force it open and descend into the lighthouse cellar.

options.name: Proceed Up from Cellar
options.description: Move into the main lighthouse.

title: Warning Valerius (Betray Unbound)
description: You manage to warn Valerius or his servant about the impending Unbound attack.

options.name: Valerius Prepares Defenses?
options.description: He might activate traps or confront the Unbound.

options.name: Warning Falls on Deaf Ears / Too Late?
options.description: They don't believe you or the attack begins.

title: Alerting Guards (Framing Success)
description: You alert the guards to your 'discovery' of the planted evidence on Keeper Marius. They investigate, finding the incriminating items.

options.name: Guards Arrest Marius!
options.description: Your frame works! The Keeper is detained.

options.name: Guards are Skeptical / Marius Explains
options.description: They question the evidence or Marius talks his way out.

title: Rumors Spread (Guardian)
description: Your false rumors take root. The Guard Captain becomes suspicious of Marius, potentially hampering his movements or leading to an official inquiry.

options.name: Marius is Hindered
options.description: He is preoccupied dealing with the accusations.

title: Framing Failure (Guardian)
description: Your attempts to frame Marius fail. Either no one believes the rumors, the planted evidence is dismissed, or Marius learns you are responsible.

options.name: Face Marius's Retribution?
options.description: He knows you tried to frame him.

options.name: Plan Fails, Return to Other Methods
options.description: Need a new approach.

title: Luring Marius into Trap
description: You attempt to lure Marius into the physical trap you (and possibly Silas) set. [Deception or Stealth check to lead him without suspicion].

options.name: Trap Sprung!
options.description: He falls into the trap!

options.name: He Detects Trap / Avoids It
options.description: Your lure fails, he likely becomes hostile.

title: Psychological Warfare (Guardian)
description: Based on Elara's insights, you consider exploiting Marius's sense of duty or introducing chaos to throw him off balance.

options.name: Create Chaotic Diversion
options.description: Cause widespread panic or disorder to distract him.

options.name: Present Moral Dilemma?
options.description: Try to force him into a choice that conflicts with his duty.

options.name: Plan Seems Too Abstract/Difficult
options.description: Revert to more direct methods.

title: Using 'Ashen Spire'
description: During a confrontation with Marius, you mention the 'Ashen Spire'. His eyes flash with pain or anger for a split second. 'You know nothing,' he grits out, perhaps momentarily distracted or angered.

options.name: Press Advantage (Distracted?)
options.description: Use his momentary lapse to attack or escape.

options.name: He Recovers Quickly
options.description: The mention angers him but doesn't incapacitate him.

title: Investigating Ashen Spire
description: You decide to investigate the 'Ashen Spire' mentioned by Silas. This likely requires leaving Nestlebrook and journeying to find this potentially ruined temple.

options.name: Begin Journey to Ashen Spire
options.description: Leave Nestlebrook to seek new location. [New Story Branch / Area].

title: Arrested for Vagrancy/Defiance
description: Refusing the guard's order to move along while begging results in your arrest for vagrancy and defying the Watch.

options.name: Taken to Jail
options.description: Locked up.

title: Fleeing Guard (Begging)
description: The guard sees you try to slip away and gives chase! 'Hey! Stop!'

options.name: Attempt to Escape
options.description: Run through the streets. [Athletics/Stealth check].

options.name: Caught by Guard
options.description: He catches you.

title: Lighthouse Symbol Reaction
description: You snatch your hand back from the symbol, feeling the lingering cold or seeing the confusing afterimages. The symbols seem potent and potentially dangerous.

options.name: Avoid Touching More Symbols
options.description: Decide against further physical interaction.

options.name: Ascend Stairs
options.description: Head upwards.

title: Symbol Flare Alert
description: The symbol you touched flares brightly! You hear footsteps from the stairs above - someone is coming to investigate!

options.name: Hide in Entry Chamber
options.description: Quickly find cover.

options.name: Prepare to Fight/Confront
options.description: Ready yourself for whoever appears.

options.name: Flee Lighthouse
options.description: Get out before they arrive.

title: Using Tumbler on Wall
description: You press the Whispering Tumbler against a matching glowing symbol on the lighthouse wall. There's a deep resonant *click* that echoes through the stone. A section of the wall grinds open, revealing a hidden passage OR the symbols all flare, channeling energy into the Tumbler!

items.name: Whispering Tumbler
items.description: Key Fragment, used on lighthouse wall.

options.name: Enter Hidden Passage
options.description: Explore the secret way.

options.name: Deal with Energized Tumbler
options.description: The Tumbler hums intensely, feeling warm and powerful.

title: Bypassing Stair Trap
description: Using your skills [Thieves' Tools/Dexterity?], you successfully disable or avoid the pressure plate / arcane glyph on the stairs.

options.name: Continue Ascending Safely
options.description: Proceed up.

title: Servant on 'Control'
description: 'Control?' the servant repeats, tilting its head slightly. 'Control of fate. Of possibility. The Master seeks to... adjust... the Loom of Reality. For the greater good, of course.' The explanation is deeply unsettling.

options.name: Decide Valerius is Mad/Dangerous
options.description: His goals sound world-threatening.

options.name: Give Up Questioning
options.description: Ascend stairs.

title: Servant on Builders/Containment
description: Asking about who built the lighthouse or what it contains, the servant replies, 'Builders are forgotten. What it contains... is potential. Or perhaps... consequence. The Master ensures it remains... stable.'

options.name: Assume Contains Loc
options.description: Connects to other lore.

options.name: Give Up Questioning
options.description: Ascend stairs.

title: Waiting for Valerius (Captive)
description: Bound in the lighthouse entry, you wait. Eventually, footsteps descend the stairs. A tall figure in scholar's robes, with piercing eyes and an air of intense focus, appears - Master Valerius.

options.name: Face Valerius
options.description: He will likely interrogate you.

options.name: Try Last Escape Attempt?
options.description: Make a final bid for freedom.

title: Lighthouse Laboratory
description: You enter a room filled with strange devices - humming crystals, bubbling alembics, lenses on articulated arms, wires connecting arcane apparatus. It smells of ozone and chemicals. Notes and charts are scattered across tables.

options.name: Examine Notes/Charts
options.description: Try to understand Valerius's research. [Arcana/Investigation check].

options.name: Tamper with Machinery? (Risky)
options.description: Try disabling or altering the devices.

options.name: Search for Valuables/Tumbler
options.description: Look for useful items or the Key Fragment.

options.name: Continue Up Stairs
options.description: Leave the lab, proceed higher.

title: Lighthouse Library
description: You enter a library level. Bookshelves line the curved walls, filled with ancient, leather-bound tomes. The air is thick with dust. Some books lie open on reading stands, marked with bookmarks.

options.name: Examine Open Books
options.description: See what Valerius is studying (Celestial Charts? Binding Rituals? Loc?). [Investigation/Arcana check].

options.name: Search for Specific Knowledge
options.description: Look for books on Key Fragments, Keepers, Unbound, etc.

options.name: Look for Hidden Compartments/Items
options.description: Search for valuables or secrets.

options.name: Continue Up Stairs
options.description: Leave the library, proceed higher.

title: Observing Main Chamber
description: Peeking into the main chamber reveals: Valerius working intently at a control panel OR Unbound cultists chanting around an altar OR Keeper Marius confronting Valerius/Unbound.

options.name: Intervene / Enter Chamber
options.description: Reveal yourself and join the situation.

options.name: Continue Observing
options.description: Wait and see what happens.

options.name: Retreat Downstairs
options.description: Avoid the confrontation/activity.

title: Stair Encounter Diplomacy
description: You try to bluff the person you met on the stairs (Valerius/Marius/Unbound/Servant). 'Just leaving,' or 'The Master sent for me.' [Deception check, DC varies by who it is].

options.name: Bluff Succeeds
options.description: They let you pass (up or down?) or seem confused.

options.name: Bluff Fails
options.description: They see through it! Prepare for combat.

title: Stair Encounter Combat!
description: Combat erupts on the narrow spiral staircase! You fight the person you encountered (Valerius/Marius/Unbound/Servant).

options.name: Initiate Combat
options.description: [Combat vs specific NPC depends on who was encountered].

title: Opening Lighthouse Sea Chest
description: You manage to open the locked sea chest in the cellar. Inside is a waterlogged captain's log detailing a voyage near the Whispering Shoals OR old Keeper robes and a symbol OR valuable trade bars (50 GP).

options.name: Read Captain's Log
options.description: See if it mentions the wreck or strange occurrences.

options.name: Take Keeper Robes/Symbol
options.description: Potentially useful for disguise?

options.name: Take Trade Bars
options.description: Pocket the valuables.

options.name: Ascend Stairs
options.description: Leave the cellar.

title: Lighthouse Hidden Niche
description: Behind the loose stone, you find a small niche containing: a single, smooth obsidian shard OR a small pouch of dust that glitters faintly OR nothing but cobwebs.

options.name: Take Obsidian Shard
options.description: Another shard?

options.name: Take Glittering Dust
options.description: What is this strange dust?

options.name: Ascend Stairs (Niche Empty)
options.description: Leave the cellar.

title: Ascending into Ambush?
description: Hearing footsteps above, you ascend the cellar stairs cautiously. As you emerge into the entry chamber, you see the Servant OR an Unbound Cultist OR Keeper Marius waiting for you!

options.name: Fight!
options.description: Engage the waiting opponent.

options.name: Attempt to Retreat to Cellar
options.description: Try to flee back down.

title: Hiding from Lighthouse Alert
description: You quickly hide near the cellar grate as someone approaches from inside the lighthouse.

options.name: Observe Who Emerges
options.description: See who investigates the noise.

title: Confrontation at Grate
description: The Servant OR an Unbound Cultist OR Keeper Marius emerges from the lighthouse (main door or cellar grate if opened from inside), investigating the noise you made.

options.name: Fight!
options.description: Engage them.

options.name: Attempt to Flee
options.description: Run!

options.name: Attempt Diplomacy/Bluff
options.description: Try talking.

title: Window Observation Notes
description: You note the contents of the room seen through the window (guard post? library? lab?). This might inform your decision whether to enter or how to proceed.

options.name: Try to Enter Window
options.description: Attempt to pry bars or find loose one.

options.name: Climb Down
options.description: Return to the ground.

title: Reaching Higher Lighthouse Level
description: Your difficult climb pays off! You reach a higher window or perhaps even the walkway around the lantern room itself. The view is dizzying, the wind strong.
