options.name: Look for Entry Point Here
options.description: Check windows or doors at this level.

options.name: Peer into Lantern Room
options.description: Try to see the 'Focusing Array' / Valerius.

options.name: Climb Back Down?
options.description: Decide this is too high/dangerous.

title: The Fall (Ending)
description: Your grip fails high on the lighthouse wall. You plummet downwards, the rocks and sea rushing up to meet you. Your quest ends in a fatal impact. [Game Over]

options.name: The End
options.description: Your story ends here.

title: Inside via Window
description: You are inside the lighthouse, having entered via a window. You are likely on a middle level - perhaps the library, laboratory, or a simple storage room.

options.name: Explore Current Level
options.description: Search the room you are in.

options.name: Find Stairs (Up or Down?)
options.description: Locate the central staircase.

title: Bribing the Dock Guard
description: You offer the Dockmaster's guard a bribe. [Persuasion check DC 13]. Success: He accepts! Failure: He refuses, possibly raises alarm.

options.name: Proceed to Shed (If Success)
options.description: The guard looks the other way.

options.name: Bribe Fails, Abort/Flee (If Failure)
options.description: Plan compromised.

title: Sneaking Past Dock Guard
description: You attempt to sneak past the guard to the shed door. [Stealth check DC 14]. Success: You reach the door undetected! Failure: He spots you!

options.name: Attempt Lock (If Success)
options.description: Try opening the shed.

options.name: Caught! (If Failure)
options.description: Confront the guard.

title: Targeting Shed Window
description: At night, you approach the barred window of the Dockmaster's shed. You could try prying the bars or breaking the glass.

options.name: Pry Bars (Noisy)
options.description: [Strength check DC 15?]

options.name: Break Glass (Noisy)
options.description: Smash the window pane.

options.name: Try Door Instead
options.description: Attempt the padlock.

title: Opening Shed Lock
description: Success! The padlock on the Dockmaster's shed opens.

options.name: Enter Shed
options.description: Go inside.

title: Breaking Shed Lock
description: With a loud snap, you break the padlock. The noise might attract the guard.

options.name: Enter Shed Quickly
options.description: Get inside before guard investigates.

options.name: Guard Alerted!
options.description: He heard the noise!

title: Confronting Dock Shed Guard
description: The Dockmaster's guard confronts you as you attempt to break into the storage shed!

options.name: Fight the Guard
options.description: [Combat].

options.name: Attempt to Flee
options.description: Run.

options.name: Attempt to Bribe/Bluff
options.description: Try talking your way out.

title: Diversion Fails (Shed)
description: Your diversion didn't last long enough. The guard returns before you can break into the shed.

options.name: Abort Heist
options.description: Plan failed.

options.name: Confront Guard Now?
options.description: Try bribery or combat.

title: Catching the Spy
description: You manage to catch the fleeing spy, cornering him in an alley.

options.name: Interrogate Him
options.description: Demand to know who hired him.

options.name: Fight Him
options.description: Combat.

options.name: Let Him Go?
options.description: Decide not to press further.

title: Spy Escapes
description: The spy manages to escape your pursuit or you let him go. He disappears into Nestlebrook.

options.name: Confront Suspected Employer (Silas?)
options.description: Go talk to who you think hired him.

options.name: Increase Caution
options.description: Assume you are still being watched.

title: Deciding Spy's Fate
description: The spy has revealed his employer (or you've intimidated him). Do you let him go, or silence him permanently?

options.name: Let Him Go (Warned)
options.description: Tell him to disappear.

options.name: Kill Him (Ending?)
options.description: Ensure silence. [Murder might attract Guard attention; Dark Path point?].

title: Confronting Spy's Employer
description: Knowing who hired the spy, you go to confront them (Silas, Borin, Guard Captain, Faction contact?).

options.name: Confront Silas
options.description: Go to the pawn shop.

options.name: Confront Borin
options.description: Find the merchant.

options.name: Confront Guard Captain (Risky)
options.description: Go to the jailhouse.

options.name: Confront Faction (Unbound/Keeper)
options.description: Seek them out.

title: Spy Loot
description: Looting the defeated spy yields a few gold and potentially a note confirming Silas hired him.

options.name: Leave Scene
options.description: Disappear before guards arrive.

options.name: Confront Silas (with Proof?)
options.description: Go to the pawn shop.

title: Fighting the Apothecary

enemies.name: Apothecary Owner
enemies.description: An elderly but surprisingly feisty shop owner.

description: The apothecary owner attacks you with surprising vigor, wielding a heavy pestle like a club!
limitation: Owner likely tries to shout for help. Victory leads to Node 1518. Defeat leads to Node 1519.

title: Surrendering to Apothecary
description: You surrender or manage to talk down the apothecary owner, perhaps dropping any stolen goods. They warily let you leave or hold you for the guards.

options.name: Allowed to Leave (Warned)
options.description: They let you go, telling you never to return.

options.name: Held for Guards
options.description: They detain you until the Watch arrives.

title: Nestlebrook Graveyard
description: You arrive at the old Nestlebrook graveyard. It's overgrown, with leaning headstones and shadowed corners. You need to find Shadowthistle weeds.

options.name: Search for Shadowthistle
options.description: Look for the specific weed. [Nature/Survival check].

options.name: Disturbed Ground / Open Grave?
options.description: Notice signs of recent activity.

options.name: Encounter Ghoul/Spirit?
options.description: The graveyard isn't entirely peaceful.

title: Resting After Aid
description: You take a moment to rest in the relative safety provided by the stranger's help (Inn steps, outside Elara's). You feel slightly recovered.

options.name: Seek Proper Healing/Shelter
options.description: Knock on Elara's door or find coin for Inn.

options.name: Move On
options.description: Leave the safe spot.

title: Looting Second Thug
description: Searching the second thug yields very little - perhaps a few more copper pieces (1d6 CP).

options.name: Stagger Out Seeking Help
options.description: Leave the alley.

title: Barkeep Defeated
description: You defeat the barkeep! He lies unconscious behind the bar. The tavern is likely yours to loot briefly before guards inevitably arrive.

options.name: Loot Till/Barkeep
options.description: Grab cash and valuables.

options.name: Flee Tavern
options.description: Get out now.

title: Defeated by Barkeep (Ending)
description: The barkeep handily defeats you and throws you out into the street, likely concussed and possibly robbed again by witnesses. Your time in Nestlebrook ends ignominiously. [Game Over? Or Severe Setback -> 207]

options.name: Fade to Black (Ending)
options.description: Your story ends here.

options.name: Wake Up in Alley
options.description: Return to injured state.

title: Robbing Inn Room
description: Using the stolen key, you enter the traveler's room at the Salty Siren. You quickly search their belongings.

options.name: Find Valuables
options.description: Discover coin (2d10 GP?), jewelry, or useful gear.

options.name: Find Nothing Much
options.description: Only clothes and mundane items.

options.name: Traveler Returns!
options.description: The room's occupant walks in!

title: Checking Stolen Bag
description: Discreetly checking the stolen bag: It contains traveler's clothes, some rations, and a pouch with 1d12 GP.

options.name: Keep Contents
options.description: Take the loot.

options.name: Ditch the Bag
options.description: Leave the bag behind.

title: Leaky Barrel Game Outcome
description: Playing in the rigged game: You inevitably lose money OR win slightly through sheer luck before being accused of cheating OR spot an undeniable cheat in action.

options.name: Lose Money, Leave Game
options.description: Cut your losses.

options.name: Accused of Cheating!
options.description: Deal with the fallout.

options.name: Call Out Cheater
options.description: Expose the rigged game.

title: Exposing Cheats (Leaky Barrel)
description: You call out the cheaters in the backroom game! The game immediately dissolves into chaos and likely a multi-person brawl.

options.name: Fight Your Way Out
options.description: Engage in the brawl.

options.name: Slip Away During Chaos
options.description: Use the fight as a diversion to escape.

title: Allying with Cheater?
description: You subtly approach one of the cheaters, suggesting a partnership. They eye you, then grin. 'Two heads are better than one. Help me fleece these marks, we split 60/40 - my favor.'

options.name: Agree to Partnership
options.description: Join forces to cheat.

options.name: Decline Offer
options.description: Don't trust them.

title: Old Man's Possessions
description: You keep the few coppers and possibly the worn locket stolen from the old man.

options.name: Examine Locket?
options.description: See if it's valuable or significant.

options.name: Leave Tavern
options.description: Exit.

title: Returning Pouch
description: Feeling a pang of conscience, you discreetly slip the old man's pouch back into his pocket or onto the table beside him. He remains oblivious.

options.name: Leave Tavern
options.description: Exit.

title: Lagger Defeated
description: You quickly defeat the isolated Unbound cultist. The others likely heard the struggle and are coming!

options.name: Flee into Wilderness
options.description: Run before the others arrive.

options.name: Prepare for Remaining Cultists
options.description: Get ready to fight the rest.

options.name: Quickly Loot Body
options.description: Check pockets before fleeing/fighting.

title: Defeated by Lagger
description: Even the lagging cultist manages to overpower you in your weakened/bound state. You are subdued again.

options.name: Re-captured
options.description: Back to being dragged to the lighthouse.

title: Hostage Ploy Success
description: Your hostage ploy works! The remaining Unbound cultists reluctantly let you retreat into the wilderness, perhaps warning you not to interfere again.

options.name: Escape into Wilderness
options.description: You are free.

title: Taken Upstairs (Lighthouse Captive)
description: Bound, you are forced up the spiraling lighthouse stairs. You pass levels containing strange machinery or libraries, eventually reaching the upper chamber or lantern room where Valerius awaits.

options.name: Confrontation with Valerius
options.description: Face the master of the lighthouse.

title: Captive in Entry Chamber
description: The Unbound leave you guarded by the gaunt servant in the lighthouse entry chamber while their leaders ascend. This might be your only chance.

options.name: Attempt to Overpower Servant
options.description: Try fighting the servant while bound or if you can loosen ropes.

options.name: Try to Talk to Servant
options.description: Attempt reasoning or bribery.

options.name: Work on Bonds Quietly
options.description: Focus on freeing yourself before they return.

title: Playing the Acolyte
description: You play the part of a willing convert. The Unbound seem to accept it, though remain watchful. They might task you with assisting in the ritual preparations, offering a chance to sabotage or learn more.

options.name: Assist with Ritual (Sabotage Opp.)
options.description: Help prepare, looking for a chance to disrupt.

options.name: Gather Information
options.description: Ask questions about Loc and their plans.

options.name: Look for Escape Opportunity
options.description: Seek a chance to flee.

title: Elara's Reward
description: Elara accepts the Moonpetal Blossom, its glow reflecting in her sharp eyes. 'Well done. As promised, knowledge.' She explains more about the Key Fragments' nature, their connection to Loc's prison (the Lighthouse itself?), and warns that Valerius seeks to usurp Loc's power, not just release it. 'He is meddling with forces that could unmake reality. The ritual tonight is critical.' She might also offer a tangible reward (e.g., Potion of Greater Healing or 50 GP).

options.name: Head to Lighthouse (Stop Ritual)
options.description: Armed with knowledge, go prevent the ritual.

options.name: Ask Elara for More Help/Tools
options.description: Request further assistance against Valerius.

options.name: Leave Nestlebrook (Knowledge Gained)
options.description: Decide the danger is too great, leave town. [Branch End]

title: Fey Warnings
description: You ask the Fey voice about the Outer Tide and balance. 'The tides of fate ebb and flow,' it whispers. 'Loc's prison anchors one reality. Its unlocking risks... others. Changes ripple. The Moonpetal blooms when tides are potent. Go now. Interfere, or don't. Consequences follow.' The presence fades.

options.name: Gather Blossom, Return to Elara
options.description: Heed the cryptic warning.

title: Withdraw from Pool
description: You quickly pull your hand from the unnaturally cold pool, the strange sensations fading, leaving you uneasy.

options.name: Gather Blossom, Leave Grotto
options.description: Focus on the task.

title: Drinking Pool Water (Ending)
description: Ignoring caution, you drink the icy water from the pool. Reality fractures. Visions overwhelm you - endless doors, swirling chaos, the crushing weight of tides. Your mind cannot comprehend the power. You collapse, lost in the currents of Loc's prison. [Game Over]

options.name: The End
options.description: Your story ends here.

title: Dealing with Pixies
description: You try to catch or scare off the mischievous pixies. They either dissolve into giggles and vanish OR one zaps you with weak fey magic (minor debuff?) before disappearing.

options.name: Continue Search for Falls
options.description: Ignore the fey annoyance.

title: Harvesting Spider Parts
description: You manage to harvest poison from the spider's fangs OR gather usable silk from its spinnerets. [Requires successful Survival/Nature check].

options.name: Take Poison/Silk
options.description: Acquire the harvested item.

options.name: Harvest Fails
options.description: Unable to safely extract parts.

title: Moving Camp (Post-Spider)
description: Unnerved by the spider attack, you quickly pack up and find a new campsite further away.

options.name: Rest at New Camp
options.description: Settle down again.

title: Eating Feylights
description: You eat the glowing mushrooms. Your vision sharpens in the dim light, granting you Darkvision for a time (e.g., 1 hour).

options.name: Return to Camp (with Darkvision)
options.description: Head back.

options.name: Explore Further Using Darkvision
options.description: Use the enhanced sight.

title: Shrine Meditation
description: You spend time meditating at the hidden shrine. You feel a sense of calm, perhaps gaining temporary inspiration or a minor blessing (e.g., Advantage on next Wisdom save).

options.name: Return to Camp (Refreshed)
options.description: Head back.

title: Taking Shrine Crystal
description: You try to pry one of the humming crystals from the shrine. [Strength check DC 15?]. Success: You get it, but the shrine's energy fades, maybe angering a spirit? Failure: It's firmly embedded or crumbles.

options.name: Take Crystal (If Success)
options.description: You have a resonating crystal.

collectedItems.name: Resonating Crystal
collectedItems.description: A crystal humming with faint energy.

options.name: Fail / Anger Spirit?
options.description: Deal with consequences.

options.name: Leave Shrine
options.description: Return to camp.

title: Excavating Disturbed Earth
description: You dig where the earth was disturbed. You uncover a hastily buried corpse (old prospector?) OR a small lockbox OR nothing but disturbed rocks.

options.name: Examine Corpse
options.description: Check for clues or cause of death.

options.name: Open Lockbox
options.description: Check contents.

options.name: Give Up Digging
options.description: Nothing found.

title: Following Digging Tracks
description: Following the tracks from the digging site leads towards the prospectors' camp OR towards the Unbound cave.

options.name: Go Towards Prospectors' Camp
options.description: See if they were responsible.

options.name: Go Towards Unbound Cave
options.description: Investigate the cultist lair.

title: Entering the Burrow (Ending)
description: You crawl into the dark, musky burrow. It descends steeply. Suddenly, the earth gives way beneath you! You tumble down into darkness, landing hard. You are trapped, injured, in the lair of whatever beast dug this hole. [Game Over / Severe Setback leading to capture?]

options.name: Trapped and Injured (Ending)
options.description: Your story ends here.

title: Listening at Burrow
description: Listening at the burrow entrance, you hear deep, rumbling breathing OR the chittering of many small creatures OR silence.

options.name: Avoid Large Beast (Breathing)
options.description: Leave the burrow alone.

options.name: Consider Clearing Nest (Chittering)
options.description: Maybe giant rats or insects?

options.name: Enter Cautiously (Silence)
options.description: Risk exploring.

title: Escaping Quicksand
description: You stumble into quicksand! Thinking fast, you try to slowly pull yourself out using nearby roots or by spreading your weight. [Strength check DC 14]. Success: You escape! Failure: You sink deeper.

options.name: Escape Quicksand (If Success)
options.description: You pull free, shaken.

options.name: Sink... (Ending) (If Failure)
options.description: The mud pulls you under. [Game Over]

title: Observing Mystery Boat's Actions
description: Following the mystery boat towards the Whispering Shoals, you see it meet another, larger vessel in the fog OR pull into a hidden cove marked by strange symbols OR simply vanish into the mist near the rocks.

options.name: Observe Meeting
options.description: Try to see who they meet. [Perception check].

options.name: Investigate Hidden Cove
options.description: Approach the cove cautiously.

options.name: Return to Port (Vanished)
options.description: Lost them, head back.

title: Lost Mystery Boat
description: You lose the mysterious fishing vessel in the darkness or fog near the Whispering Shoals, or decide pursuit is too risky.

options.name: Return to Nestlebrook/Seabrook
options.description: Head back to port.

title: Reporting Faction Pin
description: You decide to report the faction pin (Unbound or Keeper) found under the pier.

options.name: Report to Elara
options.description: Inform the scholar.

options.name: Report to Keeper Marius (If Unbound pin)
options.description: Alert the Guardian.

options.name: Report to Unbound? (If Keeper pin)
options.description: Alert the cultists.

title: Connecting Note to Squid
description: The deciphered note confirms Finnigan's contact 'Squid' and the 'Tide's Turn' password for the midnight rendezvous under the old pier. This seems like a viable, if shady, escape route.

options.name: Plan to Meet Squid
options.description: Head to the old pier at midnight.

options.name: Ignore Information
options.description: Decide against using the smuggler.

title: Delivering Sensitive Package
description: Carrying the heavy package, you navigate Seabrook's streets towards the Salty Dog tavern. Do you encounter trouble?

items.name: Sensitive Package
items.description: A heavy, cloth-wrapped package of unknown contents.

options.name: Arrive Safely
options.description: Reach the Salty Dog without incident.

options.name: Intercepted by Salty Dogs?
options.description: Rival gang members spot you, suspecting you work for Kraken's Crew.

options.name: Intercepted by Guards?
options.description: The Watch stops you, curious about the package.

title: Peeking Inside Package
description: In a quiet alley, you carefully unwrap a corner of the package. Inside, you see metal - possibly weapons OR coins OR strange clockwork parts.

items.name: Sensitive Package
items.description: A heavy package containing [Weapons/Coins/Clockwork].

options.name: Rewrap and Deliver
options.description: Continue the delivery.

options.name: Keep the Contents? (Betray Job)
options.description: Steal the contents and ditch the delivery.

title: Abandoning Delivery
description: Deciding the delivery is too risky or suspicious, you ditch the package in a refuse heap or back alley. You won't get paid, and the Leaky Barrel barkeep will be angry if he finds out.

options.name: Return to Leaky Barrel (Lie?)
options.description: Go back and claim you delivered it or lost it.

options.name: Avoid Leaky Barrel
options.description: Don't go back.

title: Stakeout for Squid
description: You hide near the old pier at midnight, waiting for the smuggler 'Squid'. Eventually, you see his boat approach and meet with another shadowy figure OR no one shows up.

options.name: Observe Meeting (If Occurs)
options.description: Try to see who Squid meets and what they exchange.

options.name: Confront Squid (If He Shows)
options.description: Reveal yourself.

options.name: No Show, Give Up
options.description: Squid doesn't appear.

title: Provoking Kraken's Crew
description: You try to provoke the Kraken's Crew into committing a crime while guards might be nearby (insult them, start a minor scuffle).

options.name: They Attack You (Guards Witness?)
options.description: You become the victim, potentially leading to their arrest.

options.name: They Ignore You / Chase You Off
options.description: Provocation fails.

title: Scouting Merchant House
description: Observing the merchant house: Lower windows are latched but look weak. A dog barks occasionally from the yard. Few lights on at night.

options.name: Target Weak Window (Night)
options.description: Plan to force a window.

options.name: Deal with Dog First?
options.description: Plan to distract or silence the dog.

options.name: Abort Heist
options.description: Dog/difficulty is too much.

title: Merchant House Infiltration
description: You attempt to break into the merchant's house at night, likely via a window. [Stealth/Thieves' Tools checks, possible check to bypass dog].

options.name: Enter Successfully
options.description: You are inside the house.

options.name: Caught! (Dog/Owner/Guard)
options.description: Alarm raised!

title: Inside Guard Office
description: You've successfully snuck into the Guard Captain's office. There's a desk, filing cabinets, and a sturdy evidence locker.

options.name: Search Desk/Files
options.description: Look for keys or useful documents.

options.name: Attempt Evidence Locker Lock
options.description: [High DC Thieves' Tools check].

title: Taking Cover (Lighthouse Approach)
description: You and Brynn dive for cover as the alarm is raised at the lighthouse. Whoever spotted you might investigate or start shooting.

options.name: Observe Response
options.description: See who comes out or if they fire.

options.name: Charge Entrance Now
options.description: Attack before they organize.

options.name: Attempt Retreat
options.description: Try to withdraw under potential fire.

title: Forced Entry (w/ Brynn)
description: With Brynn's help (providing muscle or covering you), you attempt to force the main lighthouse door or pick the lock.

options.name: Entry Successful!
options.description: Get inside.

options.name: Entry Fails / Trapped?
options.description: Door holds, maybe triggers trap.

title: Brynn Defeated
description: Keeper Marius defeats Brynn! She lies injured or unconscious. Marius now turns his attention to you.

options.name: Fight Marius Alone
options.description: Face the powerful Keeper.

options.name: Attempt to Flee
options.description: Run!

options.name: Surrender?
options.description: Give up.

title: Silas Heist Entry (w/ Brynn)
description: You attempt to enter Silas's shop (door/grate) while Brynn keeps watch. Success: You get inside. Failure: Entry fails / Alarm raised.

options.name: Inside Shop (If Success)
options.description: Begin searching.

options.name: Alarm! (If Failure)
options.description: Brynn might engage guards/Silas while you flee?

title: Reliquary Ambush (w/ Brynn)
description: Ambush sprung! Brynn engages the guards while you move to secure the heavy Reliquary box.

options.name: Secure Box While Brynn Fights
options.description: Attempt to lift and escape with the box.

options.name: Help Brynn Fight?
options.description: Join the combat against the guards.

title: Seeking Passage North
description: In [New Port], you ask around for ships heading back towards Nestlebrook or the northern coast. Finding direct passage might be difficult or expensive.

options.name: Find Passage (Pay/Work)
options.description: Secure a way back.

options.name: Unable to Find Passage Quickly
options.description: Need to wait or find another way.

title: Exploring New Port
description: You spend some time exploring [New Port]. It offers different opportunities, dangers, and perhaps distractions from your original quest. [Leads to new potential adventures, possibly ending the Nestlebrook focus].

options.name: Embark on New Adventures Here (Ending)
options.description: Forget Nestlebrook, start fresh. [Branch End]

options.name: Gather Supplies/Info for Return Trip
options.description: Prepare to go back.

title: Unbound Attack Silas!
description: While you're 'protecting' Silas, Unbound cultists arrive, demanding artifacts or information! Do you defend the fence as promised?

options.name: Fight the Unbound
options.description: Defend Silas. [Combat].

options.name: Betray Silas, Let Unbound Take Him?
options.description: Step aside or join the Unbound.

options.name: Attempt to Negotiate/Warn Off Unbound
options.description: Try talking.

title: Keeper Visits Silas!
description: Keeper Marius arrives at Silas's shop, likely looking for the Tumbler or information. Silas looks terrified. Do you intervene?

options.name: Confront Marius (Defend Silas?)
options.description: Step between them.

options.name: Let Marius Question/Threaten Silas
options.description: Stay hidden or uninvolved.

options.name: Attack Marius?
options.description: Fight the Keeper.

title: Uneventful Watch (Silas)
description: Your watch over Silas's shop is uneventful. No factions appear. Silas seems relieved and gives you the agreed reward (information or perhaps 30 GP).

options.name: Collect Reward, Part Ways
options.description: Deal concluded.

title: Bypassing Cellar Trap
description: You successfully spot and bypass the trap (tripwire/plate) in Silas's cellar.

options.name: Continue Searching Cellar
options.description: Look for loot.

options.name: Ascend Stairs
options.description: Head up.

title: Picking Silas's Strongbox
description: You work on the lock of Silas's strongbox. [Thieves' Tools DC 16]. Success: It opens! Failure: Lock holds.

options.name: Check Contents (If Success)
options.description: See what's inside.

options.name: Give Up / Try Forcing (If Failure)
options.description: Can't pick it.

title: Taking Silas's Strongbox
description: Deciding picking the lock is too hard or time-consuming, you attempt to take the entire strongbox. It's heavy.

options.name: Attempt to Escape with Box
options.description: Try carrying it out stealthily. [Stealth/Strength checks].

options.name: Leave Box, Abort Heist
options.description: Too heavy or risky.

title: Searching Silas's Quarters
description: You search Silas's living quarters. It's messy but might contain hidden valuables. [Investigation check DC 14]. Success: Find hidden stash. Failure: Nothing but personal effects.

options.name: Take Loot (If Found)
options.description: Grab the coin and Tumbler.

options.name: Leave Quarters (If Nothing Found)
options.description: Return downstairs.

options.name: Silas Returns!
options.description: He enters the room!

title: Inside Harbormaster's Office
description: Inside the office: Search desk for keys, look for the seized goods lockbox.

options.name: Find Keys on Desk
options.description: Success!

collectedItems.name: Harbormaster's Keys
collectedItems.description: Keys to the harbormaster's office and lockbox.

options.name: Find Lockbox (Requires Keys/Picking)
options.description: Locate the box containing seized items.

options.name: Find Nothing Useful, Leave
options.description: Office search fails.

title: Harbormaster Keys Acquired
description: You have successfully acquired the Harbormaster's keys!

items.name: Harbormaster's Keys
items.description: Keys to the harbormaster's office and lockbox.

options.name: Go to Office/Shed to Use Keys
options.description: Head to the location of the seized goods lockbox.

title: Caught in Residence
description: You are caught inside the private residence (Harbormaster's or Merchant's) by the owner or house guards!

options.name: Fight Your Way Out
options.description: [Combat].

options.name: Attempt to Flee
options.description: Try to run.

options.name: Surrender
options.description: Give up.

title: Stealing Wood (Guards Bribed)
description: With the guards looking the other way thanks to your bribe, you quickly load up some of the valuable rare wood (as much as you can carry/conceal).

options.name: Escape with Stolen Wood
options.description: Leave the scene.

title: Wood Cart Combat

enemies.name: Cart Driver
enemies.description: A simple teamster.

enemies.name: Guard (x1 or x2)
enemies.description: Escorting the valuable cargo.

description: You ambush the cart carrying Borin's rare wood shipment!
limitation: Driver might surrender. Victory leads to Node 1528. Defeat leads to Node 1529.

title: Wood Storage Infiltration
description: You successfully sneak into Borin's storage area (or defeat the cart guards). Stacks of valuable, exotic timber are piled high.

options.name: Take Manageable Amount of Wood
options.description: Grab a few valuable pieces.

options.name: Look for Specific Type/Markings?
options.description: Examine the wood more closely.

title: Smuggler's Journey
description: Squid pilots his small boat expertly through the dark waters out of the harbor. 'Keep low,' he mutters. 'Coast Guard patrol sometimes. Where to? Nearest cove up the coast, or drop you near Seabrook?'

options.name: Choose Nearest Cove (Ending)
options.description: Get dropped off at a secluded spot nearby. [Branch End]

options.name: Choose Seabrook
options.description: Head towards the next port town.

options.name: Encounter Coast Guard Patrol!
options.description: Trouble finds you at sea.

title: Finnigan Refund?
description: You demand your money back from Finnigan. He whines, 'Can't help if Squid got spooked! No refunds!' [Intimidation check DC 14?]. Success: He reluctantly gives back half. Failure: He refuses.

options.name: Take Partial Refund (If Success)
options.description: Get some money back.

options.name: Threaten Further (If Failure)
options.description: Escalate.

options.name: Leave
options.description: Give up.

title: Threatening Finnigan
description: You threaten the informant, Ratty Finnigan. He's scrawny and easily scared, likely to give up coin or information under duress.

options.name: He Gives You Coin (Extortion)
options.description: He hands over 1d10 GP.

options.name: He Offers Different Information
options.description: 'Don't hurt me! Know something else... about the Keeper!'

options.name: He Tries to Flee
options.description: The rat bolts!

title: Reliquary Contents
description: The Reliquary lock opens! Inside, nestled on velvet lining, is NOT another Key Fragment, but a complex astrolabe pulsing with faint energy OR a single, perfect black pearl radiating cold OR detailed schematics of the Lighthouse's Focusing Array.

options.name: Take Pulsing Astrolabe
options.description: Secure the magical device.

options.name: Take Black Pearl
options.description: Secure the ominous gem.

options.name: Take Lighthouse Schematics
options.description: Secure the valuable plans.

title: Reliquary Trap!
description: Trying to pick the Reliquary lock triggers a trap! Choose: Arcane Alarm (loud magical shriek alerts guards) OR Poison Needle (DC 14 CON save or take poison damage/condition).

options.name: Deal with Alarm (Guards Coming!)
options.description: Flee or prepare for fight.

options.name: Deal with Poison
options.description: Address poison effects.

title: Leaving Ship Stealthily
description: Deciding against stealing the Reliquary, you carefully make your way back out of the ship, avoiding guards and crew.

options.name: Return to Docks
options.description: Safely back ashore.

title: Dock Brawl Escape
description: You fight your way out of the dockside brawl you instigated.

options.name: Escape Scene
options.description: Get away from the docks.

title: Opening the Reliquary
description: In a safe place, you examine the heavy Reliquary box. It's lead-lined and covered in wards. Opening it likely requires dispelling magic or forcing the complex lock.

items.name: Reliquary Box
items.description: A heavy, lead-lined box covered in wards.

options.name: Attempt to Dispel Wards / Pick Lock
options.description: [Requires Arcana/Thieves' Tools, High DC].

options.name: Attempt to Force Box Open
options.description: [Strength check, might damage contents?].

options.name: Seek Expert Help (Elara?)
options.description: Take the box to someone knowledgeable.

title: Delivering Reliquary to Elara
description: You bring the heavy Reliquary box to Elara. Her eyes widen as she examines the wards. 'Potent... This belonged to the Keepers, likely. Used to transport dangerous artifacts safely. Opening it requires care.' She agrees to help open it in exchange for studying its contents.

options.name: Allow Elara to Open It
options.description: She carefully dispels wards and opens the lock.

title: Selling the Reliquary Box
description: You try to sell the unopened Reliquary box. Most fences (like Silas) refuse, fearing its obvious magical nature and wards. Perhaps a collector of arcane oddities or Elara might buy it?

items.name: Reliquary Box
items.description: A heavy, lead-lined box covered in wards.

options.name: Try Selling to Elara
options.description: Offer it to the scholar.

options.name: Try Selling to Antiquities Shop?
options.description: Offer it to the Curios & Relics owner?

options.name: Keep Box, Try Opening
options.description: Decide to open it yourself.

title: Trapped Cultist Defeated
description: You easily dispatch the trapped Unbound cultist.

options.name: Loot Body
options.description: Check pockets.

options.name: Wait for Others / Reset Trap?
options.description: See if more arrive.

options.name: Proceed to Cave/Ruins
options.description: Continue your journey.

title: Partner Confrontation
description: You confront your treacherous partner. 'Where's my share?!' or 'You left me!' They might apologize, fight, or flee.

options.name: They Offer Partial Share (Apology?)
options.description: They give you some of the loot.

options.name: They Fight You!
options.description: Combat ensues.

options.name: They Try to Flee
options.description: Chase them?

title: Elara on Soul Shards
description: 'Soul shards,' Elara confirms, handling them carefully. 'Often used by necromancers or shadow cultists (like some Unbound) to power rituals or bind spirits. Dangerous. Finding them near that cave... suggests dark work within.'

options.name: Ask How to Use/Destroy Them
options.description: Inquire about the shards' properties.

options.name: Keep Shards Cautiously
options.description: Hold onto them.

options.name: Ask Elara to Dispose of Them
options.description: Let her handle the dangerous items.

title: Signaling Prisoners
description: You try to discreetly signal the caged prisoners. One looks up, eyes wide with desperate hope, but also fear - they seem too terrified to act or respond.

options.name: Attempt Rescue
options.description: Try freeing them.

options.name: Continue Observing
options.description: Gather more info.

title: Chaos in the Cavern
description: The cavern is in chaos from the rockfall! Unbound scatter, shout, some are injured. What do you do in the confusion?

options.name: Escape
options.description: Slip out during the panic.

options.name: Attack Disorganized Cultists
options.description: Press the advantage.

options.name: Free Prisoners
options.description: Head for the cages.

options.name: Grab Objective (Tumbler/Chest?)
options.description: Go for the main prize.

title: Rockfall Mishap (Ending)
description: Your attempt to cause a rockfall goes wrong! The collapse blocks your exit or, worse, buries you under tons of stone. Your interference ends fatally. [Game Over]

options.name: The End
options.description: Your story ends here.

title: Escaping with Prisoners
description: You manage to free the terrified prisoners and lead them out of the Unbound cavern, possibly fighting guards on the way.

options.name: Reach Safety (Wilderness/Town)
options.description: Get the prisoners clear of immediate danger.

options.name: Ambushed While Escaping!
options.description: More Unbound block your exit!

title: Ranged Attack on Leader
description: You fire a shot (arrow/bolt/spell) at the Unbound leader, Kaelen. [Attack roll]. Hit: He's wounded! Chaos erupts! Miss: Your shot goes wide, alerting everyone!

options.name: Press Attack (If Hit)
options.description: Follow up on the wounded leader.

options.name: Fight Begins (If Miss)
options.description: Combat starts.

title: Stealth Takedown Attempt (Leader)
description: You attempt to sneak up on Kaelen for a silent takedown. [Very High DC Stealth]. Success: You eliminate the leader quietly! Failure: You are spotted!

options.name: Leader Down! (If Success)
options.description: Cultists are leaderless. Cause chaos? Escape?

options.name: Spotted! Fight! (If Failure)
options.description: Combat begins.

title: Challenging Unbound Leader
description: You step out and challenge Kaelen directly. He turns, surprised, then smiles coldly. 'Bold. Foolish, but bold. You wish to interfere with Loc's return?'

options.name: Fight Kaelen (and Followers)
options.description: Engage the leader.

options.name: Attempt Diplomacy/Bargaining?
options.description: Try to reason or make a deal.

title: Escaping with Unbound Chest
description: You manage to steal the chest from the Unbound cavern and escape back into the wilderness.

options.name: Find Safe Place to Open Chest
options.description: Examine your loot.

options.name: Flee the Region
options.description: Get away before Unbound pursue.

title: Grabbing the Tumbler (Altar)
description: You attempt to sneak to the altar and grab the Tumbler. [High DC Stealth/Sleight of Hand check]. Success: You snatch it! Failure: Caught!

options.name: Escape with Tumbler! (If Success)
options.description: Flee the cavern with the artifact.

options.name: Caught! Fight! (If Failure)
options.description: Cultists react.

title: Looting Cave Guard
description: Quickly looting the defeated cave guard yields a few coppers and maybe a waterskin.

options.name: Enter Cave
options.description: Proceed inside.

title: Pursued into Cave
description: You pushed past the guard, but hear him shouting and giving chase behind you in the narrow passage!

options.name: Try to Lose Him in Tunnels
options.description: Look for side passages or darkness.

options.name: Turn and Fight
options.description: Face him in the passage.

options.name: Run into Main Cavern (Towards More Cultists?)
options.description: Flee deeper.

title: Griffon Encounter (Ending?)
description: A large Griffon swoops down, seeing you as prey or an intruder in its territory! Fight or Flee?

options.name: Fight the Griffon
options.description: [Combat - Dangerous Foe].

options.name: Attempt to Flee/Hide
options.description: Try to escape the aerial predator.

title: Merchant Caravan Encounter
description: You encounter a merchant caravan heading towards Oakhaven. They seem well-guarded but might offer trade, information, or passage.

options.name: Ask to Join Caravan (Safety/Passage)
options.description: Offer coin or services.

options.name: Trade Goods
options.description: See if they will buy/sell.

options.name: Ask for News/Directions
options.description: Gather information.

options.name: Avoid Caravan
options.description: Continue journey alone.

title: Navigating Rockslide
description: The path to Oakhaven is blocked by a recent rockslide. You need to find a way over or around the treacherous obstacle. [Survival/Athletics check DC 14]. Success: You navigate safely. Failure: You slip, take minor injury, or are significantly delayed.

options.name: Continue Journey (If Success / Minor Delay)
options.description: Proceed towards Oakhaven.

options.name: Turn Back? (If Failure / Major Delay)
options.description: Decide the path is too difficult.

title: Prospectors in Tavern
description: You follow the prospectors into the Drunken Sailor. They order strong drinks and start talking loudly about 'shiny dust' and 'cave trouble', possibly attracting unwanted attention.

options.name: Eavesdrop on Them
options.description: Listen for more details.

options.name: Confront Them Here
options.description: Approach them at their table.

options.name: Warn Them? (About Unbound?)
options.description: Tell them who might be in the cave.

title: Using Silas's Keys
description: You return to Silas's shop with his keys. You can now easily unlock the front door OR perhaps a specific strongbox if the key fits.

options.name: Enter Shop Using Key
options.description: Unlock the door.

options.name: Try Key on Strongbox (If Found Earlier)
options.description: See if the key fits the safe.

title: Fighting After Diversion
description: Your failed diversion angers the Guardian or Barkeep, leading to combat!

options.name: Fight Guardian
options.description: [Combat].

options.name: Fight Barkeep
options.description: [Combat].

title: Siding with Guardian (Tavern Brawl)
description: You join Keeper Marius in fighting the Unbound cultists near the tavern exit.

options.name: Fight Unbound
options.description: [Combat - You + Marius vs Unbound].

title: Siding with Unbound (Tavern Brawl)
description: You betray Marius and join the Unbound cultists in fighting the Keeper!

options.name: Fight Marius
options.description: [Combat - You + Unbound vs Marius].

title: Keeper Slain (Ending)
description: You choose to kill the defeated Keeper Marius (or the spy). This ruthless act removes a powerful obstacle (or loose end) but may draw the ire of his order or the town guard. The consequences remain unseen... for now. [Branch End / Dark Path point]

options.name: Flee Nestlebrook
options.description: Disappear before consequences arrive.

options.name: Continue Your Plans
options.description: Proceed, knowing you crossed a line.

title: Escaping Keeper's Custody
description: You manage to free yourself from the Keeper's bonds! You are loose inside his makeshift prison (inn room? guard cell?).

options.name: Sneak Out
options.description: Try to escape the building/area undetected. [Stealth check].

options.name: Look for Confiscated Items
options.description: Try to retrieve your gear / the Tumbler before leaving.

title: Silas Shop Assault (w/ Unbound)
description: You and the Unbound storm Silas's shop! Combat ensues.

options.name: Fight Silas
options.description: [Combat - You + Unbound vs Silas].

title: Warning Silas (Betray Unbound)
description: You rush to Silas's shop and warn him the Unbound are coming to attack him, likely for the Tumbler or related items. He panics!

options.name: Help Silas Defend Shop?
options.description: Offer to fight alongside him.

options.name: Advise Silas to Flee/Hide
options.description: Tell him to get out.

options.name: Use Situation to Your Advantage?
options.description: Demand Tumbler/Coin from Silas for the warning.

title: Warning Marius (Betray Unbound - Silas)
description: You find Keeper Marius and warn him that the Unbound are planning to attack Silas the fence.

options.name: Marius Intervenes?
options.description: Does he go to stop the attack?

options.name: Marius Lets It Happen?
options.description: Perhaps he sees Silas as expendable or guilty.

title: Fighting Marius (w/ Unbound)
description: The ambush is sprung! You and the Unbound cultists fight Keeper Marius.

options.name: Combat: Keeper vs Alliance
options.description: [Combat - You + Unbound vs Marius].

title: Keeper Detects Ambush
description: Marius sees through your bait attempt or senses the hidden Unbound! 'Fools!' he roars, readying his axe for battle!

options.name: Fight Marius (Ambush Failed)
options.description: [Combat - You + Unbound vs Marius, no surprise].

title: Marius Prepares Counter-Ambush
description: Marius nods grimly at your warning. 'Their arrogance will be their undoing. Let them come.' He directs you to a position, preparing to turn the Unbound's ambush against them.

options.name: Participate in Counter-Ambush
options.description: Fight alongside Marius against the Unbound.

options.name: Observe Counter-Ambush
options.description: Watch the battle unfold.

title: Marius Ignores Warning
description: Marius seems unimpressed or distrustful of your warning about the Unbound ambush. 'I am always prepared,' is all he says.

options.name: Leave Him to His Fate?
options.description: Let the ambush happen.

options.name: Try to Help Despite His Dismissal?
options.description: Intervene when the ambush occurs.

title: Lighthouse Breached (w/ Unbound)
description: Together, you smash down the lighthouse door! You and the Unbound cultists pour into the entry chamber.

options.name: Face Servant / Valerius
options.description: Confront whoevers inside.

title: Lighthouse Assault Repelled
description: Your assault on the lighthouse door is met with resistance! The door holds firm, perhaps magical wards flare, or defenders (Servant? Valerius?) attack from within.

options.name: Press the Attack?
options.description: Continue trying to break through.

options.name: Retreat with Unbound
options.description: Fall back.

title: Valerius Warned
description: Valerius (or his servant) receives your warning about the Unbound. He might activate defenses, prepare spells, or confront the cultists when they arrive.

options.name: Watch the Confrontation Unfold
options.description: See how Valerius handles the Unbound.

options.name: Offer to Help Valerius?
options.description: Side with the scholar against the cult.

options.name: Slip Away Before Fight
options.description: Leave them to it.

title: Guardian Arrested!
description: Your frame job works! Based on the planted evidence or rumors, the Nestlebrook Watch arrests Keeper Marius, despite his protests. A powerful piece is temporarily removed from the board.

options.name: Capitalize on His Absence
options.description: Pursue goals (Lighthouse? Unbound?) while he's detained.

options.name: Worry About Retribution (Keepers)
options.description: Will his Order investigate?

title: Marius Hindered by Rumors
description: The rumors you spread cause the Guard Captain to watch Marius closely, questioning his actions and restricting his movements somewhat. He's annoyed but not stopped.

options.name: Use His Distraction
options.description: Act while he's dealing with the Watch.

options.name: He Eventually Clears His Name?
options.description: The rumors fade, he resumes activities.

title: Guardian Trapped!
description: Marius falls into your trap! He's caught in the net / falls into the pit / is locked in the cellar. He is temporarily incapacitated.

options.name: Confront Trapped Guardian
options.description: Talk to him while he's helpless.

options.name: Leave Him Trapped
options.description: Abandon him.

options.name: Take His Axe/Sigil?
options.description: Loot him while he's trapped.

title: Guardian Chaos Diversion
description: You attempt to create widespread chaos (e.g., incite a riot, release animals) hoping to distract Marius by appealing to his need for order.

options.name: Chaos Erupts! (Success)
options.description: Marius is forced to deal with the chaos.

options.name: Diversion Fails / Backfires
options.description: Chaos is contained or draws negative attention to you.

title: Guardian Moral Dilemma
description: You try to create a situation forcing Marius to choose between two conflicting duties (e.g., protecting innocents vs stopping Unbound ritual happening simultaneously elsewhere).

options.name: Dilemma Presented
options.description: See how he reacts. Does he hesitate?

title: Pressing Guardian's Weakness
description: Seeing Marius react to the name 'Ashen Spire', you press the advantage.

options.name: Attack While Distracted
options.description: Strike now!

options.name: Demand Answers About Ashen Spire
options.description: 'What happened there, Marius?'

options.name: Use Distraction to Escape
options.description: Flee while he's off balance.

title: Journey to Ashen Spire (Ending)
description: You leave Nestlebrook behind, seeking the truth about the Ashen Spire and Keeper Marius's past. This journey takes you far from the immediate conflict over the Tumbler and the lighthouse. [Branch End - New Area]

options.name: Seek the Ashen Spire
options.description: Your story continues elsewhere.

title: Hiding from Lighthouse Alert
description: You quickly dive behind crates or into deep shadows in the lighthouse entry chamber as footsteps descend the stairs. The Servant (or Valerius?) enters the room, looking around suspiciously.

options.name: Remain Hidden (Stealth Check)
options.description: Stay still and hope they don't spot you.

options.name: Attempt Ambush from Hiding
options.description: Attack them from cover.

title: Lighthouse Hidden Passage
description: The hidden passage revealed by the Tumbler leads down into darkness, smelling of dust and old magic. It seems to bypass the main staircase.

items.name: Whispering Tumbler
items.description: Key Fragment, used on lighthouse wall.

options.name: Explore the Secret Passage
options.description: Proceed into the unknown tunnel.

options.name: Return to Entry Chamber
options.description: Decide against the secret route for now.

title: Energized Tumbler
description: The Tumbler glows warmly in your hand, humming with absorbed energy from the lighthouse wall. It feels more potent, but also perhaps more unstable or noticeable.

items.name: Whispering Tumbler
items.description: Key Fragment, charged with lighthouse energy.

options.name: Try Using Its Power?
options.description: Attempt to consciously channel the energy.

options.name: Ascend Stairs (With Charged Tumbler)
options.description: Proceed upwards, carrying the energized artifact.

title: Valerius Judged Dangerous
description: The servant's words about 'controlling fate' confirm your fears. Valerius is not just a reclusive scholar; he's a potentially world-altering threat. Stopping him seems imperative.

options.name: Ascend Stairs (Confrontation Imminent)
options.description: Head up to face him.

options.name: Seek Allies (Elara/Marius)
options.description: Try to get help before confronting Valerius.

options.name: Flee Lighthouse to Warn Others
options.description: Escape and alert authorities or other powers.

title: Facing Valerius (Captive)
description: Master Valerius regards you coolly, his eyes sharp and intelligent. 'An unexpected variable,' he murmurs. 'Brought here by the Unbound fools, or perhaps drawn by the artifact? No matter. Tell me what you know of the Key Fragment.'

options.name: Cooperate (Tell Him Everything)
options.description: Share your knowledge.

options.name: Refuse / Stay Silent
options.description: Defy him.

options.name: Attempt Escape (If Possible)
options.description: Look for a chance to break free.

title: Examining Lab Notes
description: The notes detail complex calculations involving tides, stars, and 'resonant harmonics'. Diagrams show the lighthouse beam interacting with celestial bodies and something deep beneath the sea. There are references to 'Loc', 'Key Fragments', and the 'Focusing Array'. [Arcana/Investigation check success].

options.name: Take the Notes
options.description: Steal the research.

options.name: Try to Sabotage Lab Based on Notes
options.description: Use the info to disrupt machinery.

options.name: Leave Lab
options.description: Continue exploring.

title: Tampering with Lab Machinery
description: You try messing with the strange arcane machinery. [Arcana/Thieves' Tools check DC 15]. Success: You disable a key component, causing sparks or humming to cease! Failure: You trigger a minor magical backlash (1d6 force damage?) or alert Valerius!

options.name: Sabotage Successful!
options.description: You've hindered his work.

options.name: Backlash / Alert!
options.description: Deal with injury or confrontation.

title: Searching Lighthouse Lab
description: Searching the lab: You find valuable alchemical ingredients OR a spare Healing Potion OR perhaps the Tumbler left on a workbench.

options.name: Take Ingredients/Potion/Tumbler
options.description: Secure the found item.

options.name: Find Nothing Else of Note
options.description: Continue exploring.

title: Moving Higher (Lighthouse)
description: You leave the current level (Lab/Library) and continue ascending the lighthouse staircase.

options.name: Reach Next Level
options.description: Arrive at the next floor (Library/Lantern Room?).

title: Examining Lighthouse Books
description: The open books detail: complex star charts marking upcoming alignments OR rituals for binding/unbinding powerful entities OR histories mentioning Loc and the creation of the lighthouse prison. [Arcana/History check success].

options.name: Take a Relevant Tome
options.description: Steal a valuable book.

options.name: Note Key Information
options.description: Memorize crucial details.

options.name: Continue Searching Library
options.description: Look for more.

title: Searching Lighthouse Library
description: Searching the library shelves: You find a hidden compartment containing the Tumbler OR a Keeper's journal detailing their duty OR a scroll of Protection from Energy.

options.name: Take Tumbler/Journal/Scroll
options.description: Secure the found item.

options.name: Find Nothing Else Useful
options.description: Continue exploring.

title: Library Hidden Items
description: Searching carefully: You find a loose shelf hiding Silas's Coded Ledger (if he was defeated/robbed?) OR a map showing ley line convergences, one marked at the lighthouse.

options.name: Take Ledger/Map
options.description: Secure the found item.

options.name: Find Nothing Hidden
options.description: Continue searching.

title: Entering Lighthouse Main Chamber
description: You step into the main upper chamber of the lighthouse. Valerius / Unbound / Marius turn as you enter. 'An interruption,' Valerius might say, or 'More fools?' from the Unbound/Marius.

options.name: State Intentions (Ally/Oppose/Demand)
options.description: Declare your purpose.

options.name: Attack!
options.description: Initiate combat.

title: Observing Lighthouse Confrontation
description: Watching hidden: Valerius argues with the Unbound leader OR Marius confronts Valerius about his research OR the Unbound prepare their ritual.

options.name: Wait for Fight/Ritual Start
options.description: See how things escalate.

options.name: Intervene Now
options.description: Step in.

title: Bluff Succeeds (Stairs)
description: Your bluff works! The figure on the stairs seems confused or accepts your presence, allowing you to pass (up or down) or hesitating long enough for you to act.

options.name: Continue Past Them (Up/Down)
options.description: Proceed carefully.

options.name: Attack While Confused?
options.description: Take advantage.

title: Lighthouse Stair Fight
description: Combat ensues on the narrow spiral staircase against [Opponent determined by Node 1159: Servant, Unbound, Marius, or Valerius].

options.name: Fight!
options.description: [Combat Node leads to Victory/Defeat path for specific enemy].

title: Waterlogged Captain's Log
description: You carefully read the soggy logbook found in the sea chest. It details the final voyage of the 'Seafoam's Kiss', its encounter with strange whispers near the Shoals, mentions of the crew acting strangely, and the discovery of a 'wrong' crate before the ship went down.

options.name: Connects to Wreck Rumors
options.description: Confirms the stories and the Dockmaster's crate.

options.name: Keep Logbook
options.description: Take the log.

title: Keeper Robes
description: You take the old Keeper robes and symbol from the chest. They might allow for disguise, but wearing them could attract unwanted attention from either faction.

items.name: Old Keeper Robes
items.description: Weathered robes bearing a faint keyhole symbol.

options.name: Ascend Stairs
options.description: Leave cellar.

title: Trade Bars Found
description: You take the valuable silver trade bars (50 GP value) from the sea chest.

options.name: Ascend Stairs
options.description: Leave cellar.

title: Another Obsidian Shard
description: You find another cold obsidian shard, identical to those found at the Unbound camp.

options.name: Take Shard
options.description: Add it to your collection.

title: Glittering Dust
description: You take the pouch of glittering dust. It feels oddly inert, yet seems faintly magical. (Arcane Dust? Spell Component?).

items.name: Glittering Dust Pouch
items.description: A pouch of fine, glittering dust of unknown properties.

options.name: Ascend Stairs
options.description: Leave cellar.

title: Retreating to Cellar
description: You retreat back down into the damp, dark cellar, hoping your pursuer doesn't follow.

options.name: Hide in Cellar
options.description: Find cover amongst the crates.

options.name: Try Escaping via Grate
options.description: Head back to the grate entrance.

title: Entry Point (High Level)
description: At this high level, you find a heavy service hatch leading into the lantern room OR narrow, barred windows offering glimpses inside.

options.name: Attempt Service Hatch
options.description: Try opening the hatch (locked?).

options.name: Peer Through Windows
options.description: Try to see inside the lantern room.

options.name: Climb Back Down
options.description: Too high/dangerous.

title: Peering into Lantern Room
description: Peering through a high window or hatch, you see the lighthouse's lantern room. Complex machinery (the Focusing Array?) dominates the center, lenses aimed outwards. Valerius is there, adjusting controls OR Unbound are chanting around it OR Marius confronts Valerius.

options.name: Try to Enter Lantern Room
options.description: Find a way in (hatch?).

options.name: Observe the Scene
options.description: Watch the final confrontation/ritual unfold from outside.

options.name: Climb Back Down
options.description: Decide not to interfere.

title: Exploring Lighthouse Mid-Level
description: The room you entered via the window contains [Based on Node 1166 or random]: basic storage OR a small alchemical workstation OR bunks suggesting guards were stationed here.

options.name: Search Room Thoroughly
options.description: Look for items or clues.

options.name: Find Stairs Up/Down
options.description: Locate the central staircase.

title: Finding Lighthouse Stairs (Mid-Level)
description: You locate the central spiral staircase connecting the lighthouse levels.

options.name: Ascend Towards Lantern Room
options.description: Head upwards.

options.name: Descend Towards Base
options.description: Head downwards.

title: Prying Shed Bars
description: You attempt to pry the bars on the Dockmaster's shed window. [Strength check DC 15, noisy]. Success: Bars bend! Failure: Bars hold, noise made.

options.name: Enter via Window (If Success)
options.description: Squeeze through.

options.name: Guard Alerted! (If Failure)
options.description: Noise attracts guard.

title: Breaking Shed Window
description: You smash the shed window (or enter after bending bars). The noise likely alerts the guard. Inside, you see crates, including one large one marked with odd symbols (the target?).

options.name: Grab Crate Quickly?
options.description: Try to take the marked crate. [Heavy?].

options.name: Guard Arrives!
options.description: He heard the noise!

title: Inside Dockmaster's Shed
description: You are inside the Dockmaster's storage shed. It contains various confiscated goods and, prominently, the large crate recovered from the shipwreck, marked with strange symbols.

options.name: Attempt to Open Crate
options.description: Try prying it open. [Strength check?].

options.name: Attempt to Take Crate
options.description: Try carrying the whole crate out. [Very Heavy?].

options.name: Search Rest of Shed
options.description: Look for other valuables.

options.name: Leave Shed
options.description: Exit.

title: Fighting Dock Shed Guard

enemies.name: Dock Shed Guard
enemies.description: Guard protecting the Dockmaster's property.

description: The guard guarding the Dockmaster's shed confronts you!
limitation: Guard might shout for backup. Victory leads to Node 1606. Defeat leads to Node 1607.

title: Fleeing Dock Shed Guard
description: You flee from the Dockmaster's shed guard (or residence guards), escaping into the Seabrook night.

options.name: Escape Seabrook (Ending?)
options.description: Use the escape to leave town.

options.name: Find Hiding Place
options.description: Lie low.

title: Confronting Guard Captain
description: You confront the Guard Captain about hiring someone to spy on you (or after being defeated by shed guard). This is a bold move.

options.name: Demand Explanation
options.description: Ask why they had you watched.

options.name: Captain Orders Arrest!
options.description: They react badly to the confrontation.

title: Defending Silas (Unbound Attack)
description: You fight alongside Silas against the attacking Unbound cultists!

options.name: Combat: Unbound vs You & Silas
options.description: [Combat].

title: Betraying Silas (Unbound Attack)
description: You step aside or actively help the Unbound cultists as they attack Silas.

options.name: Unbound Overpower Silas
options.description: They defeat the fence, possibly taking artifacts.

options.name: Silas Fights Back Fiercely?
options.description: Maybe he has hidden defenses?

title: Negotiating with Unbound (Silas)
description: You try to negotiate with the Unbound attacking Silas's shop, perhaps offering information or the Tumbler (if you have it) for Silas's safety (or your own).

options.name: Negotiation Succeeds
options.description: They agree to leave Silas alone in exchange for info/item.

options.name: Negotiation Fails
options.description: They attack anyway.

title: Confronting Marius (Silas)
description: You step forward as Keeper Marius confronts Silas. 'Leave him be, Keeper. His business is minor.'

options.name: Marius Focuses on You
options.description: 'Interference again? Step aside.'

options.name: Marius Questions Silas Anyway
options.description: He ignores you and presses the fence.

title: Watching Marius & Silas
description: You observe as Marius questions Silas. Silas is terrified, likely reveals information about the Tumbler or Unbound if pressed.

options.name: Marius Leaves (Got Info?)
options.description: The Keeper departs after questioning Silas.

options.name: Marius Arrests/Attacks Silas?
options.description: The Keeper decides Silas is guilty.

options.name: Intervene Now?
options.description: Decide to step in.

title: Inn Room Loot
description: Searching the inn room yields [1d20+10 GP] OR some valuable traveler's gear (spyglass, compass) OR documents related to trade/travel.

options.name: Take Loot, Leave Room
options.description: Exit the room with your score.

title: Inn Room Empty
description: The inn room contains nothing of value, just mundane clothes and personal effects.

options.name: Leave Room Quietly
options.description: Exit.

title: Caught Robbing Inn Room!
description: The occupant of the inn room returns while you are searching! 'Hey! What are you doing in my room?! Thief!'

options.name: Fight the Traveler
options.description: [Combat vs Traveler NPC].

options.name: Attempt to Flee Past Them
options.description: Run out of the room.

options.name: Try to Bluff/Apologize
options.description: 'Wrong room! Sorry!'

title: Keeping Stolen Bag Contents
description: You keep the contents of the stolen bag (clothes, rations, 1d12 GP).

options.name: Leave Inn
options.description: Exit.

title: Cheating Partnership
description: You agree to help the cheater. Working together, you manage to subtly manipulate the game, winning a decent pot (3d10 GP) before suspicion rises. You split the winnings (60/40).

options.name: Take Your Cut, Leave
options.description: Part ways with your temporary, untrustworthy partner.

title: Examining Old Locket
description: You examine the worn locket stolen from the old man. It contains faded portraits that look vaguely familiar OR is empty.

options.name: Keep Locket
options.description: Hold onto it.

title: Wood Cart Defeat (Ending)
description: The guards escorting the wood shipment overpower you. You are apprehended for ambush and attempted theft. Your journey likely ends in a Nestlebrook jail cell. [Game Over / Capture Ending]

options.name: Imprisoned (Ending)
options.description: Your story ends here.

title: Examining Rare Wood
description: Examining the stolen rare wood: It has an unusual grain OR faint magical aura OR markings indicating it's destined for Valerius.

options.name: Take Wood (Noting Properties)
options.description: Escape with the wood.

title: Smuggled to Seabrook (Ending)
description: Squid successfully smuggles you to the rough port town of Seabrook under cover of darkness. You slip ashore, leaving Nestlebrook behind. New adventures, or troubles, await here. [Branch End - New Area]

options.name: Explore Seabrook
options.description: Begin adventures in the new town.

title: Coast Guard Interception! (Ending)
description: A Coast Guard patrol boat spots Squid's vessel! Lights flare, shouts demand you heave to. Squid tries to flee but is quickly caught. You are both arrested as smugglers or suspicious persons. [Capture Ending]

options.name: Arrested (Ending)
options.description: Your story ends in custody.

title: Finnigan Extorted
description: The terrified Finnigan gives you 1d10 GP to leave him alone.

options.name: Take Coin, Leave
options.description: Proceed.

title: Finnigan Flees
description: Seeing your threat, Ratty Finnigan bolts, disappearing into the alleys before you can react.

options.name: Let Him Go
options.description: Not worth chasing.

title: Reliquary Item Acquired
description: You secure the item found within the Reliquary (Astrolabe, Pearl, or Schematics).

options.name: Escape Ship / Area
options.description: Leave with your prize.

title: Dealing with Poison (Reliquary Trap)
description: You are pricked by a poison needle! [Make CON save vs Poisoned Condition]. Success: You resist the worst effects. Failure: You feel weak, nauseous (Poisoned).

options.name: Continue Heist (If Resisted)
options.description: Shake it off, try again?

options.name: Retreat (If Poisoned)
options.description: Need antidote or rest.

title: Forcing Reliquary Open
description: You manage to force the heavy Reliquary box open. [Strength check success]. Inside is [Contents from Node 1438]. The wards might discharge harmlessly or cause a minor shock.

options.name: Take Contents
options.description: Secure the item.

title: Selling Reliquary to Elara
description: You offer the sealed Reliquary box to Elara. Intrigued, she offers you 50 GP for it, unopened.

options.name: Accept 50 GP
options.description: Sell the box.

options.name: Refuse, Open It Yourself?
options.description: Decide to keep it.

title: Selling Reliquary (Antiquities)
description: The elderly owner of Curios & Relics looks apprehensive at the warded box. 'Dangerous... but fascinating. I can offer... 40 Gold?'

options.name: Accept 40 GP
options.description: Sell the box.

options.name: Refuse, Open It Yourself?
options.description: Keep the box.

title: Fighting Ex-Partner
description: Combat ensues with your treacherous former partner over the stolen loot!

options.name: Fight!
options.description: [Combat vs Cloaked Figure NPC].

title: Using Soul Shards?
description: Elara explains the obsidian shards can be used to fuel dark magic, bind spirits, or create temporary shadow constructs. Destroying them requires powerful holy magic or arcane fire.

options.name: Keep Shards (Potential Dark Use?)
options.description: Hold onto the dangerous items.

options.name: Ask Elara to Destroy Them
options.description: Let her handle it.

title: Elara Disposes of Shards
description: Elara takes the obsidian shards and performs a brief ritual, chanting words of power. They crumble into harmless dust.

options.name: Thank Elara, Continue
options.description: Danger averted.

title: Prisoners Rescued
description: You lead the grateful prisoners out of the Unbound lair to safety in the wilderness or back towards Nestlebrook. They thank you profusely, perhaps offering meager rewards or information.

options.name: Accept Thanks/Reward
options.description: A good deed done.

options.name: Leave Prisoners, Continue Mission
options.description: Part ways.

title: Escape Ambushed!
description: As you lead the prisoners out, more Unbound agents appear, blocking your escape! 'Fools! None escape Loc's service!'

options.name: Fight to Protect Prisoners
options.description: [Combat - likely outnumbered].

options.name: Abandon Prisoners, Flee?
options.description: Save yourself?

title: Unbound Leader Down
description: You successfully eliminated the Unbound leader! The remaining cultists are momentarily stunned and confused.

options.name: Press Attack on Disorganized Cultists
options.description: Fight the remaining agents.

options.name: Use Chaos to Escape
options.description: Slip away while they're leaderless.

options.name: Try to Grab Tumbler/Chest
options.description: Go for the objective during confusion.

title: Fighting Unbound Leader
description: You engage the Unbound leader, Kaelen, in combat, possibly while his followers also attack!

options.name: Combat: Kaelen & Cultists
options.description: [Combat vs Leader + Minions].

title: Negotiating with Unbound Leader
description: You attempt to talk to Kaelen instead of fighting. 'What if I helped you? What's in it for me?' Kaelen considers. 'Power... true power awaits those who serve Loc. Join us, or be swept away.'

options.name: Join the Unbound
options.description: Accept his offer.

options.name: Refuse / Attack
options.description: Turn down the offer.

title: Opening Unbound Chest
description: Safely away, you open the chest stolen from the Unbound. Inside: more Obsidian Shards OR ritual components (candles, incense, strange powders) OR maps detailing ley lines converging on the lighthouse.

options.name: Take Contents
options.description: Secure the items.

title: Losing Guard in Cave
description: Using the twisting passages or darkness, you manage to lose the pursuing cave guard.

options.name: Continue Deeper Cautiously
options.description: Proceed further in.

options.name: Try to Find Exit
options.description: Look for a way out.

title: Fighting the Griffon
description: Combat against the fierce mountain Griffon!

options.name: Griffon Combat
options.description: [Combat - Tough Encounter]. Victory -> Node 1624, Defeat -> Node 1625

title: Fleeing the Griffon
description: You attempt to flee or hide from the swooping Griffon. [Dexterity (Stealth) or Athletics check DC 15]. Success: You find cover or outrun it. Failure: It catches you!

options.name: Escape Griffon (If Success)
options.description: Continue towards Oakhaven, shaken.

options.name: Caught by Griffon! (If Failure)
options.description: Combat ensues.

title: Joining Caravan
description: The caravan master agrees to let you travel with them to Oakhaven for safety (possibly requiring coin or work). The journey is slower but safer.

options.name: Travel with Caravan
options.description: Proceed towards Oakhaven.

title: Trading with Caravan
description: You trade goods with the caravan merchants. You might sell found items or buy needed supplies.

options.name: Finish Trading, Continue Journey
options.description: Proceed towards Oakhaven.

title: Caravan News
description: The caravan guards or merchants share news: Oakhaven is bustling due to a recent silver strike OR strange creatures have been sighted in the passes OR the Baron is cracking down on banditry.

options.name: Note Information
options.description: File away news about Oakhaven region.

title: Turned Back by Rockslide
description: The rockslide proves impassable or too dangerous. Your journey to Oakhaven via this route is blocked. You must turn back.

options.name: Return Towards Nestlebrook/Coast
options.description: Head back down the mountain.

title: Warning Prospectors
description: You warn the prospectors about the Unbound cultists in the nearby cave. They pale. 'Cultists?! Gods! We're leaving this cursed mountain!' They hastily finish their drinks.

options.name: They Offer Thanks/Small Reward?
options.description: Perhaps they give you a few GP for the warning.

options.name: They Flee Town
options.description: They leave the tavern hurriedly.

title: Using Silas's Keys (Strongbox)
description: You use the stolen key on Silas's strongbox (if previously located). It clicks open! Inside: [Contents based on Node 1181].

options.name: Take Strongbox Contents
options.description: Loot the box.

title: Combat: Alliance vs Keeper
description: You fight alongside allies (Unbound Cultists or Brynn) against the formidable Keeper Marius.

options.name: Victory!
options.description: Together, you defeat the Keeper.

options.name: Defeat!
options.description: Even with help, Marius overpowers you.

title: Escaping Makeshift Prison
description: Having freed yourself, you manage to sneak out of the Keeper's makeshift prison (inn room/cell) and back onto the streets of Nestlebrook.

options.name: Flee Nestlebrook
options.description: Get out immediately.

options.name: Retrieve Gear? (If Confiscated)
options.description: Try to get your items back first.

title: Retrieving Confiscated Gear
description: After escaping your bonds, you look for your confiscated gear (including the Tumbler?). It might be in a nearby chest or room guarded by Marius.

options.name: Attempt to Retrieve Gear Stealthily
options.description: [Stealth/Sleight of Hand check vs Marius?].

options.name: Forget Gear, Escape Now
options.description: Prioritize freedom.

title: Combat: Assaulting Silas (w/ Unbound)
description: You and the Unbound attack Silas in his shop!

options.name: Victory!
options.description: Silas is defeated.

options.name: Defeat?
options.description: Silas somehow repels the attack?

title: Defending Silas (w/ Warning)
description: You stand with Silas as the Unbound arrive! Combat ensues.

options.name: Fight Unbound
options.description: [Combat - You + Silas vs Unbound].

title: Silas Flees/Hides
description: Taking your warning, Silas quickly grabs a hidden bag and flees his shop via a back exit or secret passage just as the Unbound arrive.

options.name: Face Unbound Alone?
options.description: They arrive to find Silas gone.

options.name: Flee Yourself
options.description: Get out before Unbound arrive.

title: Marius Intervenes (Silas Attack)
description: Alerted by you, Keeper Marius arrives just as the Unbound attack Silas! He engages the cultists.

options.name: Help Marius?
options.description: Join the fight against Unbound.

options.name: Help Silas Escape?
options.description: Get the fence out during the chaos.

options.name: Watch the Battle
options.description: Observe.

title: Marius Ignores Silas Attack
description: Marius seems uninterested in protecting Silas. 'The fence chose his path. My concern is the Fragment and the Unbound's ultimate goal.' He doesn't intervene.

options.name: Watch Unbound Attack Silas
options.description: Observe the outcome.

options.name: Intervene Yourself?
options.description: Decide whether to help Silas.

title: Combat: Alliance vs Keeper Result
description: The battle against Keeper Marius concludes.

options.name: Victory!
options.description: You and your allies defeat Marius.

options.name: Defeat!
options.description: Marius overpowers your combined forces.

title: Observing Counter-Ambush
description: You watch as Marius expertly turns the tables on the Unbound ambushers OR fights them near Silas's shop. The battle is fierce.

options.name: Marius Wins
options.description: The Keeper defeats the Unbound.

options.name: Unbound Win
options.description: The cultists overwhelm Marius.

options.name: Intervene?
options.description: Join the fight.

title: Ambush Proceeds (Marius Warned)
description: Despite your warning, Marius walks into the Unbound ambush. Does his preparedness make a difference?

options.name: Watch the Ambush
options.description: See the outcome.

title: Confrontation in Lighthouse
description: Entering the lighthouse with the Unbound, you face the occupants: the Gaunt Servant standing defensively OR Valerius himself, perhaps flanked by arcane constructs or Unbound loyalists.

options.name: Fight Servant/Valerius/Constructs
options.description: [Combat with Unbound allies vs Lighthouse occupants].

title: Retreating with Unbound
description: The assault on the lighthouse fails. You retreat with the Unbound cultists, thwarted for now. They likely blame you or reconsider their plans.

options.name: Part Ways with Unbound
options.description: Leave the failed alliance.

options.name: Plan New Approach with Unbound
options.description: Regroup and try again?

title: Valerius vs Unbound
description: Warned by you, Valerius confronts the Unbound as they attempt to enter. Arcane energy clashes with cultic fervor at the lighthouse door!

options.name: Watch the Battle
options.description: See who wins.

options.name: Intervene (Help Valerius/Unbound)?
options.description: Join the fight.

title: Helping Valerius
description: You decide to side with Valerius against the attacking Unbound cultists.

options.name: Fight Unbound
options.description: [Combat - You + Valerius vs Unbound].

title: Guardian Neutralized
description: With Keeper Marius arrested or significantly hindered by accusations, the path to the Unbound or Valerius is clearer. You have a window of opportunity.

options.name: Proceed to Lighthouse
options.description: Investigate Valerius/Unbound without Keeper interference.

options.name: Consolidate Gains
options.description: Use the time to rest, gather resources, or leave town.

title: Keeper Retribution Feared
description: Framing a Keeper, even successfully, feels dangerous. Their Order is ancient and powerful. Retribution might be slow, but inevitable.

options.name: Leave Nestlebrook Urgently (Ending?)
options.description: Disappear before the Keepers investigate.

options.name: Prepare for Trouble
options.description: Stay, but be ready for future conflict.

title: Guardian Clears Name
