description: Eventually, the false rumors fade or Marius proves his innocence to the Watch. He is free to act again, and likely knows you were responsible.

options.name: Face Marius's Wrath
options.description: He seeks you out.

options.name: Flee Nestlebrook
options.description: Get out before he finds you.

title: Confronting Trapped Guardian
description: Keeper Marius is trapped (netted, pit, cellar). He glares up at you. 'Release me, fool! You disrupt the balance!'

options.name: Interrogate Him
options.description: Demand answers while he's helpless.

options.name: Take His Gear
options.description: Loot him.

options.name: Leave Him Trapped
options.description: Abandon him.

options.name: Kill Him?
options.description: Finish him off.

title: Guardian Abandoned
description: You leave Keeper Marius trapped. He will eventually escape or be found, likely furious and seeking revenge. But for now, he is neutralized.

options.name: Proceed with Plans
options.description: Use the opportunity.

title: Looting Trapped Guardian
description: While Marius is trapped, you take his Guardian Axe or other visible gear. He swears vengeance.

options.name: Leave Him Trapped
options.description: Depart with his gear.

options.name: Kill Him?
options.description: Finish him.

title: Chaos Succeeds (Guardian)
description: Your chaos diversion works! Marius is forced to abandon his pursuit of you or his observation post to deal with the larger disturbance (riot, fire, etc.).

options.name: Use Opportunity
options.description: Act while he's distracted (Lighthouse? Unbound?).

title: Guardian's Dilemma
description: Faced with your manufactured dilemma (e.g., Unbound ritual starting WHILE innocents are endangered elsewhere), Marius hesitates, torn by his conflicting duties. This buys you precious moments.

options.name: Use Hesitation to Escape/Act
options.description: Take advantage of his indecision.

options.name: He Makes a Choice
options.description: He prioritizes one duty over the other.

title: Guardian on Ashen Spire
description: Pressed about the Ashen Spire, Marius's face hardens. 'A place of failure. A lesson learned in blood. It has no bearing here.' He refuses to elaborate, his anger simmering.

options.name: Drop Subject, Continue Confrontation
options.description: Return to original argument.

options.name: Use Anger as Distraction?
options.description: Attack while he's emotional?

title: Escaping Hidden Watcher
description: You remain successfully hidden as the Servant (or Valerius) investigates the flared symbol. Finding nothing, they eventually return up the stairs.

options.name: Emerge and Ascend Stairs
options.description: Proceed upwards now.

options.name: Leave Lighthouse
options.description: Too close a call. Exit.

title: Exploring Secret Passage
description: The hidden passage slopes down, then levels out. It leads to a small, hidden chamber beneath the lighthouse containing ancient Keeper archives OR a direct, concealed entrance to the cellar.

options.name: Explore Keeper Archives
options.description: Search the hidden chamber.

options.name: Enter Cellar via Secret Door
options.description: Access the cellar.

title: Seeking Allies (Valerius)
description: Realizing the danger Valerius poses, you decide to seek help before confronting him.

options.name: Find Elara
options.description: Warn the other scholar.

options.name: Find Keeper Marius
options.description: Alert the Guardian.

options.name: Try to Rally Townsfolk/Guards? (Unlikely)
options.description: Attempt to convince locals of the threat.

title: Cooperating with Valerius
description: You tell Valerius what you know. He listens patiently. 'Interesting. Another piece falls into place. Your sensitivity to the Fragment is... noted. Perhaps you can yet serve a purpose in the Great Work.' His intentions remain unnervingly ambiguous. He might release you to act as his agent, or keep you for the ritual.

options.name: Released as Agent? (Ending?)
options.description: He trusts you (or thinks he can control you) and gives you a task.

options.name: Kept for Ritual (Ending?)
options.description: Your cooperation doesn't save you from becoming fuel for his machine.

title: Refusing Valerius
description: You refuse to cooperate with Valerius, perhaps spitting defiance or staying silent. He sighs. 'Predictable. Resistance is irrelevant.' He gestures to the servant or Unbound guards. 'Prepare them for the Calibration Chamber. Their life force will serve.' You are dragged away towards the lighthouse machinery.

options.name: Struggle Futilely
options.description: Try to fight back against the guards.

title: Stealing Lab Notes
description: You quickly gather Valerius's research notes detailing his work on the Focusing Array, Loc, and celestial alignments.

items.name: Valerius's Research Notes
items.description: Detailed notes on the lighthouse, Loc, and alignments.

options.name: Leave Lab
options.description: Continue exploring or flee.

title: Lab Sabotage Success
description: Your sabotage attempt seems successful! A key piece of Valerius's machinery sparks, smokes, or goes silent. You've likely delayed his plans.

options.name: Leave Lab Quickly
options.description: Exit before the damage is discovered.

options.name: Sabotage More?
options.description: Try disabling other components.

title: Lab Sabotage Failure
description: Your attempt to tamper with the lab equipment backfires! You receive a minor shock (take 1d6 lightning damage?) OR a loud alarm sounds through the lighthouse!

options.name: Deal with Alarm/Injury
options.description: Prepare for investigation or tend wounds.

title: Lighthouse Lab Loot
description: You acquire valuable ingredients, a Healing Potion, or perhaps even the Tumbler itself from Valerius's lab.

options.name: Leave Lab
options.description: Continue exploring or flee.

title: Stealing Lighthouse Tome
description: You take one of the ancient, heavy tomes from the lighthouse library. It feels significant.

options.name: Leave Library
options.description: Continue exploring or flee.

title: Library Information Gained
description: You memorize key details from Valerius's books regarding the alignments, binding rituals, or Loc's nature. This knowledge could be crucial.

options.name: Leave Library
options.description: Continue exploring or flee.

title: Lighthouse Library Find
description: You acquire the item found hidden in the library (Tumbler, Journal, Scroll, Ledger, or Map).

options.name: Leave Library
options.description: Continue exploring or flee.

title: Stating Intentions (Lighthouse Chamber)
description: You declare your purpose in the main chamber: to stop the ritual, to seize the Tumbler/power for yourself, or perhaps to ally with one faction against another.

options.name: Initiate Final Confrontation
options.description: Based on your stated intent, combat likely begins.

title: Final Lighthouse Confrontation
description: The final battle within the lighthouse begins! You face Valerius, and potentially his allies (Servant, Constructs) or enemies (Unbound, Keeper Marius) depending on who is present and your allegiance.

options.name: Fight!
options.description: [Final Combat Scenario - Outcome determines ending].

title: Observing Climax Unfold
description: From hiding, you watch as the ritual reaches its peak OR Valerius confronts Marius OR the Unbound turn on Valerius. The situation rapidly escalates towards a conclusion.

options.name: Intervene Now (Last Chance)
options.description: Jump into the fray.

options.name: Witness Outcome
options.description: See who wins or what the ritual does.

title: Lighthouse Stair Fight Resolution
description: The fight on the stairs concludes.

options.name: Victory!
options.description: You defeat your opponent.

options.name: Defeat!
options.description: You are overcome.

title: Logbook Confirmation
description: The captain's log confirms the rumors about the 'Seafoam's Kiss' wreck, the whispers, the crew's madness, and the strange crate found  likely the one the Dockmaster now holds.

options.name: Keep Logbook
options.description: Take the evidence.

title: Escaping Cellar via Grate
description: Retreating to the cellar, you manage to force open or unlock the cellar grate and escape the lighthouse back into the open air, likely pursued.

options.name: Flee into Night
options.description: Run from the lighthouse.

title: Attempting Lantern Room Hatch
description: You try the heavy service hatch leading into the lantern room. It's either unlocked OR locked tight. [50% chance? or Locked DC 16?].

options.name: Enter Lantern Room (If Unlocked/Picked)
options.description: Access the lighthouse summit.

options.name: Hatch Locked/Stuck (If Failed)
options.description: Cannot enter this way.

title: Searching Lighthouse Mid-Level Room
description: Searching the mid-level room reveals: minor supplies OR a discarded note OR nothing of interest.

options.name: Take Supplies/Note
options.description: Pocket findings.

options.name: Find Stairs
options.description: Locate the main staircase.

title: Opening the Strange Crate
description: You manage to pry open the strange crate from the shipwreck. Inside is NOT treasure, but damp, rotting papers covered in the same symbols seen at the lighthouse AND a single, perfectly preserved obsidian shard.

options.name: Take Shard / Examine Papers
options.description: Investigate the contents.

options.name: Leave Crate Contents
options.description: Decide it's too dangerous or useless.

title: Stealing the Strange Crate
description: The crate is heavy and awkward. Attempting to move it quietly out of the shed and away from the docks is difficult. [Strength/Stealth checks].

options.name: Escape with Crate (If Success)
options.description: Get away with the mysterious crate.

options.name: Caught While Escaping (If Failure)
options.description: Guard or Dockmaster spots you.

title: Searching Rest of Shed
description: Searching the rest of the Dockmaster's shed reveals only mundane confiscated goods - fishing nets, cheap tools, maybe some low-value smuggled items.

options.name: Focus on Strange Crate
options.description: Return attention to the main item.

options.name: Leave Shed
options.description: Nothing else worth taking.

title: Leaving Dockmaster's Shed
description: You exit the Dockmaster's storage shed, either empty-handed or having decided against taking the strange crate.

options.name: Return to Seabrook Streets
options.description: Decide next move.

title: Shed Guard Defeated
description: You defeat the guard outside the Dockmaster's shed.

options.name: Enter Shed Now
options.description: Proceed with the heist.

options.name: Loot Guard, Flee Scene
options.description: Take valuables, get away.

title: Defeated by Shed Guard (Ending)
description: The Dockmaster's guard subdues you during your break-in attempt. You are arrested and likely face harsh judgment for theft of official property. [Capture Ending]

options.name: Imprisoned in Seabrook (Ending)
options.description: Your story ends here.

title: Confronting Guard Captain (Spy)
description: You confront the Guard Captain about having you followed. She regards you coolly. 'Standard procedure for suspicious individuals. You fit the description.' She offers no apology.

options.name: Accept Explanation (Lie?)
options.description: Let it go.

options.name: Argue / Demand Release (If Arrested)
options.description: Dispute her claims.

options.name: Become Hostile?
options.description: Escalate confrontation (unwise).

title: Victory with Unbound (Silas)
description: Together, you and the Unbound defeat Silas. The cultists eagerly search the shop for the Tumbler or other artifacts.

options.name: Help Them Search / Take Your Share?
options.description: Participate in looting.

options.name: Betray Unbound Now?
options.description: Attack them while they search?

options.name: Slip Away
options.description: Leave them to it.

title: Silas Overpowered by Unbound
description: Without your help (or due to your betrayal), the Unbound cultists overpower Silas. They likely kill him and ransack his shop for the Tumbler or other items of power.

options.name: Watch Aftermath / Slip Away
options.description: Observe or leave the scene.

options.name: Confront Unbound Now?
options.description: Face the victorious cultists.

title: Silas's Last Stand?
description: Betrayed, Silas fights fiercely against the Unbound, perhaps revealing hidden defenses or unexpected combat prowess. The outcome is uncertain.

options.name: Watch the Fight
options.description: See who wins.

options.name: Intervene (Help Silas/Unbound?)
options.description: Rejoin the fray.

title: Unbound Negotiation Success (Silas)
description: Your negotiation works. The Unbound agree to leave Silas alone in exchange for the Tumbler (if you have it) or key information you provide.

options.name: Unbound Depart
options.description: Deal is done. Silas is safe (for now).

title: Marius Leaves Silas
description: After questioning Silas (who likely revealed little of use), Keeper Marius departs the pawn shop, perhaps heading towards the lighthouse or continuing his investigation elsewhere.

options.name: Silas is Safe (For Now)
options.description: Your 'protection' duty seems fulfilled.

options.name: Follow Marius?
options.description: Shadow the Keeper.

title: Marius Arrests/Attacks Silas
description: Deciding Silas knows too much or is complicit, Keeper Marius moves to arrest or attack the pawnbroker!

options.name: Intervene (Defend Silas?)
options.description: Step in against the Keeper.

options.name: Let It Happen
options.description: Allow Marius to deal with Silas.

title: Leaving Inn Room (Looted)
description: You exit the inn room you burgled, possibly with loot.

options.name: Leave the Inn
options.description: Exit the Salty Siren.

title: Fighting Inn Traveler

enemies.name: Angry Traveler
enemies.description: An average traveler caught by surprise.

description: The traveler whose room you burgled attacks you!
limitation: Traveler likely shouts for help. Victory leads to Node 1654. Defeat leads to Node 1655.

title: Fleeing Inn Room
description: You manage to flee the inn room past the returning traveler (or after defeating them). You hurry out of the Salty Siren.

options.name: Escape into Streets
options.description: Disappear into Nestlebrook.

title: Bluffing Inn Traveler
description: You try to bluff the traveler ('Wrong room! So sorry!'). [Deception check DC 13]. Success: They seem confused but let you leave. Failure: They don't buy it, call for Innkeeper/Guards.

options.name: Leave Inn (If Success)
options.description: Quickly exit.

options.name: Detained/Confronted (If Failure)
options.description: Face consequences.

title: Fighting Ex-Partner

enemies.name: Cloaked Figure (Rival Thief)
enemies.description: Your former partner-in-crime.

description: The confrontation with your treacherous partner turns violent!
limitation: Rival might try to flee if losing. Victory leads to Node 1656. Defeat leads to Node 1657.

title: Justice Served / Loot Reclaimed
description: You defeat your treacherous ex-partner (or rescue the prisoners). You can reclaim the full loot (75 GP + Frog) or accept thanks/rewards.

options.name: Take All Loot / Rewards
options.description: Secure your earnings/thanks.

options.name: Leave Scene
options.description: Move on.

title: Defeated by Ex-Partner (Ending)
description: Your treacherous partner (or the Unbound ambushers) defeats you. They take any remaining loot and leave you beaten, possibly for dead. Your journey ends in betrayal and failure. [Game Over]

options.name: The End
options.description: Your story ends here.

title: Combat: Vs Kaelen & Cultists
description: The fight against the Unbound leader Kaelen and his followers begins in the heart of their lair!

options.name: Battle Resolution
options.description: [Major Combat Node - Victory/Defeat leads to final outcomes].

title: Unbound Chest Loot
description: You take the contents of the Unbound chest (Obsidian Shards / Ritual Components / Ley Line Map).

options.name: Examine Loot
options.description: Study the items more closely.

options.name: Flee Area
options.description: Leave the wilderness.

title: Griffon Victory!
description: You manage to defeat the mighty Griffon! Its feathers might be valuable, or perhaps it guarded something.

options.name: Harvest Feathers/Search Nest?
options.description: Look for rewards.

options.name: Continue Towards Oakhaven
options.description: Proceed on your journey.

title: Defeated by Griffon (Ending)
description: The Griffon is too powerful. Its sharp beak and talons overwhelm you. Your journey ends as prey on a lonely mountain pass. [Game Over]

options.name: The End
options.description: Your story ends here.

title: Traveling with Caravan
description: You travel with the merchant caravan towards Oakhaven. The journey is uneventful but slow. You eventually arrive safely.

options.name: Arrive in Oakhaven (Ending)
options.description: Begin exploring the new settlement.

title: Prospector's Thanks
description: Grateful for the warning about the cultists, the prospectors give you a small pouch of gold dust (~10 GP value) before fleeing.

options.name: Take Reward
options.description: Accept the payment.

title: Retrieving Gear (Keeper)
description: You stealthily retrieve your confiscated gear (and the Tumbler?) while escaping the Keeper's custody.

options.name: Escape Fully Equipped
options.description: Sneak out of the area.

title: Victory at Silas's (w/ Unbound)
description: Silas is defeated! The Unbound cheer darkly.

options.name: Loot Shop with Unbound
options.description: Search for the Tumbler and other valuables.

title: Silas Repels Unbound?
description: Somehow, Silas manages to repel the Unbound assault (traps? magic item?). You and the cultists are forced to retreat.

options.name: Retreat with Unbound
options.description: Fall back.

title: Facing Unbound (Silas Gone)
description: Silas has fled. The Unbound arrive at the pawn shop, finding you instead. 'Where is he? Where is the Fragment?' they demand.

options.name: Fight Them
options.description: Engage the cultists.

options.name: Try to Bluff/Misdirect
options.description: 'He went that way! With the item!'

options.name: Attempt to Flee
options.description: Run.

title: Marius Victorious (vs Unbound)
description: Keeper Marius efficiently defeats the Unbound cultists. He stands victorious, perhaps turning his attention to you.

options.name: Approach Marius
options.description: Talk to the victorious Keeper.

options.name: Slip Away
options.description: Leave while he's occupied.

title: Unbound Victorious (vs Marius)
description: The Unbound manage to overwhelm Keeper Marius! They stand over his fallen form, triumphant.

options.name: Approach Unbound
options.description: Reveal yourself to the victors.

options.name: Slip Away
options.description: Leave the scene.

title: Lighthouse Assault Combat
description: The battle for the lighthouse begins! You and the Unbound fight against Valerius / Servant / Constructs.

options.name: Fight!
options.description: [Major Combat Node - Outcome determines ending].

title: Valerius vs Unbound Battle
description: You watch the clash between Valerius (using magic/constructs?) and the invading Unbound cultists.

options.name: Valerius Wins
options.description: He repels the Unbound.

options.name: Unbound Win
options.description: They defeat Valerius.

options.name: Intervene?
options.description: Join the fight.

title: Combat: Alliance vs Unbound
description: You fight alongside Valerius against the Unbound cultists attacking the lighthouse.

options.name: Victory!
options.description: You and Valerius repel the attack.

options.name: Defeat!
options.description: The Unbound overwhelm you both.

title: Guardian Makes Choice
description: Forced to choose, Marius prioritizes stopping the Unbound ritual OR protecting the innocents, leaving the other situation unaddressed.

options.name: Capitalize on His Choice
options.description: Act while he is occupied with his chosen duty.

title: Keeper Archives
description: The hidden chamber contains dusty scrolls and books - archives of the Keepers who previously manned this lighthouse. They detail Loc's binding, past Unbound attempts, and perhaps weaknesses in the lighthouse defenses or Valerius's plans.

options.name: Study Archives (Gain Info)
options.description: Learn crucial lore or tactical information.

options.name: Take Archives?
options.description: Attempt to steal the valuable records.

options.name: Leave Chamber
options.description: Continue exploration.

title: Rallying Townsfolk (Ending)
description: You try to rally the townsfolk or guards of Nestlebrook against the 'madman' in the lighthouse. They are skeptical, fearful, or dismissive. Your warnings go unheeded, and you lack the power to force the issue alone. Unable to stop the coming events, perhaps leaving is the only option. [Branch End]

options.name: Leave Nestlebrook
options.description: Abandon the town to its fate.

title: Valerius's Agent (Ending)
description: Valerius, seeing use in your skills or connection to the Fragment, releases you but gives you a task: retrieve another artifact, spy on the Keeper, or assist in the final Calibration. You are now unwillingly (or willingly?) bound to his grand, dangerous design. [Branch End - Servant to Villain?]

options.name: Serve Valerius
options.description: Your story continues under his command.

title: Fuel for the Machine (Ending)
description: Your defiance (or cooperation) matters little. You are strapped into Valerius's arcane machinery. As the lighthouse beam intensifies and the ritual begins, your life force is drained to power the Great Unlocking. Your consciousness fades as reality warps. [Game Over]

options.name: The End
options.description: Your story ends here.

title: Dealing with Lab Alert
description: The alarm sounds or the backlash injures you! Valerius or his servant will investigate soon.

options.name: Hide in Lab
options.description: Find cover.

options.name: Flee Lab (Up/Down Stairs)
options.description: Get out.

options.name: Prepare for Confrontation
options.description: Ready yourself.

title: Final Lighthouse Battle Resolution
description: The climactic battle within the lighthouse concludes!

options.name: Victory!
options.description: You (and any allies) defeat Valerius/Unbound/Keeper.

options.name: Defeat! (Ending)
options.description: You are overcome in the final battle. [Game Over]

title: Witnessing Lighthouse Climax
description: Hidden, you witness the outcome: Valerius successfully activates the Focusing Array OR the Unbound ritual succeeds/fails OR Marius stops Valerius/Unbound OR they destroy each other.

options.name: Deal with Aftermath
options.description: React to the final situation (Loot? Escape? Confront survivors?).

title: Victory on Lighthouse Stairs
description: You defeat your opponent on the stairs.

options.name: Loot Body?
options.description: Check for items.

options.name: Continue Up/Down Stairs
options.description: Proceed.

title: Defeat on Lighthouse Stairs (Ending)
description: Your opponent defeats you on the narrow lighthouse stairs. You tumble down, unconscious or dead. [Game Over / Capture]

options.name: The End / Captured
options.description: Your story ends here or in captivity.

title: Entering Lantern Room
description: You open the service hatch and enter the lighthouse lantern room. The Focusing Array dominates the space, humming with power. Valerius is here, working controls OR the final ritual is in progress OR Marius awaits.

options.name: Confront Occupant(s)
options.description: Initiate the final encounter.

title: Shipwreck Crate Contents
description: You take the obsidian shard and soggy papers from the crate. The papers seem to detail wards or containment procedures, while the shard feels cold and wrong.

items.name: Obsidian Shard
items.description: A shard possibly tied to the crate's origin.

items.name: Waterlogged Warding Notes
items.description: Soggy notes detailing containment wards.

options.name: Leave Shed
options.description: Exit with the items.

title: Escaped with Strange Crate
description: You manage to steal the heavy, marked crate from the Dockmaster's shed.

items.name: Mysterious Marked Crate
items.description: A heavy crate recovered from a shipwreck.

options.name: Find Place to Open Crate
options.description: Get somewhere safe to examine it.

options.name: Try to Sell Crate Unopened?
options.description: Find a buyer.

options.name: Leave Seabrook with Crate
options.description: Get out of town.

title: Looting Silas with Unbound
description: With Silas defeated, you and the Unbound search his shop. They quickly find the Tumbler (if present) and any other items resonating with dark energy, ignoring mundane valuables.

options.name: Unbound Take Tumbler
options.description: They secure the Key Fragment.

options.name: Grab Mundane Loot Yourself
options.description: Take coins or other items they ignore.

title: Silas vs Unbound Outcome
description: The fight between Silas and the Unbound concludes. Silas is defeated OR he manages to drive them off.

options.name: Silas Defeated
options.description: Unbound loot the shop.

options.name: Unbound Retreat
options.description: Silas survives, possibly injured.

title: Following Marius (Post-Silas)
description: You discreetly follow Keeper Marius after he leaves Silas's shop. He heads towards the path to the Lighthouse OR back to the Drunken Sailor tavern.

options.name: Follow to Lighthouse Path
options.description: Continue pursuit.

options.name: Follow to Tavern
options.description: Observe him there.

options.name: Break Off Pursuit
options.description: Stop following.

title: Marius Deals with Silas
description: You watch as Keeper Marius deals with Silas - perhaps arresting him, confiscating items, or delivering a final warning.

options.name: Marius Leaves
options.description: He finishes his business and departs.

options.name: Marius Questions You Next?
options.description: He turns his attention to you.

title: Inn Traveler Defeated
description: You defeat the traveler whose room you were robbing.

options.name: Loot Room Thoroughly
options.description: Search without interruption.

options.name: Flee Inn
options.description: Get out before innkeeper investigates noise.

title: Defeated by Inn Traveler (Ending)
description: The traveler manages to subdue you. They shout for the innkeeper and the guards. You are caught red-handed and arrested. [Capture Ending]

options.name: Arrested (Ending)
options.description: Your story ends in jail.

title: Ex-Partner Victory
description: You defeat your treacherous ex-partner.

options.name: Reclaim Full Loot
options.description: Take the 75 GP and Jade Frog.

title: Ex-Partner Defeat (Ending)
description: Your former partner defeats you, adding injury to insult. They leave you beaten in the alley. [Game Over / Severe Setback]

options.name: Fade to Black (Ending)
options.description: Your story ends here.

options.name: Wake Up Robbed and Injured
options.description: Return to injured state.

title: Combat: Kaelen & Cultists Resolution
description: The fight against Kaelen and his Unbound cultists in their lair concludes.

options.name: Victory!
options.description: You defeat the Unbound leader and his followers.

options.name: Defeat! (Ending)
options.description: The cultists overwhelm you. [Game Over / Capture by Unbound]

title: Examining Unbound Chest Loot
description: Examining the contents of the Unbound chest: Obsidian Shards (dark magic), Ritual Components (incense, candles), Ley Line Map (shows energy flows towards lighthouse).

options.name: Keep Items
options.description: Hold onto the potentially useful/dangerous items.

title: Griffon Nest Loot
description: Searching the Griffon's nest (if found nearby): You find valuable Griffon Feathers OR shiny trinkets from previous victims OR Griffon eggs.

options.name: Take Loot
options.description: Collect the findings.

options.name: Continue Journey
options.description: Proceed towards Oakhaven.

title: Bluffing Unbound (Silas Gone)
description: You try to bluff the Unbound, claiming Silas fled towards the docks or already sold the Fragment. [Deception check]. Success: They believe you and might pursue the false trail. Failure: They see through it, focus anger on you.

options.name: Bluff Succeeds, They Leave
options.description: You misdirect them.

options.name: Bluff Fails, Fight!
options.description: They attack you.

title: Approaching Marius (Post-Victory)
description: You approach Marius after he defeated the Unbound. He nods curtly. 'Trouble dealt with. Your warning was... timely.'

options.name: Ask About Next Steps
options.description: 'What now? The lighthouse?'

options.name: Ask for Reward/Payment
options.description: Inquire about compensation.

options.name: Part Ways
options.description: Leave him be.

title: Approaching Unbound (Post-Victory)
description: You approach the Unbound after they defeated Marius. They are victorious but wary. 'You watched? Did not interfere? Perhaps... you will serve Loc after all.'

options.name: Offer Allegiance
options.description: Join them now.

options.name: Demand Reward/Share?
options.description: Try to profit from their victory.

options.name: Slip Away
options.description: Leave them.

title: Valerius Victorious (vs Unbound)
description: Valerius, using powerful magic or constructs, repels the Unbound assault. He stands amidst the aftermath, perhaps weakened but in control.

options.name: Approach Valerius Now
options.description: Talk to him after the fight.

options.name: Slip Away
options.description: Leave the scene.

title: Unbound Victorious (vs Valerius)
description: The Unbound cultists overwhelm Valerius! They take control of the lighthouse, likely capturing or killing the scholar.

options.name: Approach Unbound Victors
options.description: Deal with the cultists.

options.name: Slip Away
options.description: Flee the scene.

title: Victory with Valerius
description: Fighting alongside Valerius, you successfully repel the Unbound attack on the lighthouse!

options.name: Discuss Next Steps with Valerius
options.description: Talk about the Tumbler, Loc, future plans.

options.name: Part Ways with Valerius
options.description: Leave the lighthouse.

title: Defeat with Valerius (Ending)
description: Even together, you and Valerius are overwhelmed by the Unbound cultists. They capture or kill you both. The ritual to free Loc will likely proceed. [Game Over / Bad Ending]

options.name: The End
options.description: Your story ends here.

title: Keeper Archive Lore
description: Studying the Keeper archives reveals detailed information on Loc's binding, the history of the lighthouse as a prison, weaknesses in the Focusing Array, or perhaps methods to counter Unbound magic or even destroy a Key Fragment.

options.name: Use Knowledge (Against Valerius/Unbound)
options.description: Apply what you learned.

options.name: Leave Chamber with Knowledge
options.description: Proceed.

title: Stealing Keeper Archives
description: You gather the ancient scrolls and books from the hidden Keeper archives. This knowledge could be immensely valuable or dangerous.

options.name: Leave Chamber with Archives
options.description: Exit.

title: Warning Guards (Jail)
description: You try to warn the guards about the dangerous factions (Unbound/Keepers) interested in you or the Tumbler. They are skeptical. 'Cultists? Keepers? Sounds like prison fever. Settle down.' They don't seem to believe you or take the threat seriously.

options.name: Warning Falls on Deaf Ears
options.description: Remain imprisoned, likely still in danger.

title: Waiting for Intervention (Jail)
description: You wait in your cell, hoping Elara or another ally will intervene. Time passes... Does help arrive?

options.name: Ally Intervenes!
options.description: Elara, Marius, or someone else arranges your release or escape!

options.name: No Help Arrives
options.description: You face the magistrate alone.

options.name: Enemy Intervenes!
options.description: Unbound break you out (for their purposes) OR Keeper silences you.

title: Sending Message from Jail
description: You attempt to bribe a guard (if coin) or convince a sympathetic ear to carry a message to Elara or another potential ally outside.

options.name: Message Sent Successfully
options.description: Wait to see if help arrives.

options.name: Unable to Send Message
options.description: Cannot bribe guard or find means.

title: Looting Silas (w/ Unbound)
description: While the Unbound focus on arcane items, you quickly grab mundane valuables - coins from the till, some pawned jewelry.

options.name: Leave with Unbound
options.description: Depart the shop.

title: Unbound Secure Fragment (Silas)
description: The Unbound cultists find and take the Whispering Tumbler from Silas's shop. They seem pleased.

options.name: Leave with Unbound?
options.description: Follow them, perhaps towards lighthouse.

options.name: Part Ways
options.description: Let them go.

options.name: Attack Unbound for Tumbler?
options.description: Try to take it from them.

title: Silas Survives Unbound Attack
description: Silas somehow manages to drive off the Unbound attackers, perhaps using a hidden weapon or trap. He is likely injured but alive.

options.name: Approach Silas Now
options.description: Talk to him after the fight.

options.name: Leave Scene
options.description: Disappear.

title: Following Marius to Lighthouse
description: You follow Keeper Marius as he heads towards the path leading to the Tidecaller Lighthouse.

options.name: Continue Following
options.description: Maintain pursuit.

options.name: Try to Overtake Him?
options.description: Get there first.

title: Silas Arrested/Attacked by Marius
description: You watch as Keeper Marius arrests Silas or attacks him, deeming him guilty or knowledgeable. Silas is subdued or captured.

options.name: Marius Leaves
options.description: The Keeper departs after dealing with Silas.

options.name: Marius Notices You?
options.description: He turns his attention to you.

title: Leaving Inn Room (Looted - Minor)
description: You leave the burgled inn room, possibly with minor loot.

options.name: Exit the Salty Siren
options.description: Leave the inn.

title: Joining Rigged Game (Leaky Barrel)
description: You join the rigged game, working with your new cheater ally. You carefully signal each other or manipulate dice, winning steadily.

options.name: Win Substantial Amount (Before Caught)
options.description: Manage to win ~50 GP before suspicion gets too high.

options.name: Get Caught Cheating!
options.description: Someone spots the collusion!

title: Old Man's Locket
description: Examining the worn locket: Inside are tiny, faded portraits that strongly resemble a younger YOU and your FATHER. A wave of emotion and memory washes over you. How did this end up here?

items.name: Father's Locket
items.description: A worn locket with portraits of you and your father.

options.name: Question the Old Man (If Able)
options.description: Try to ask him where he got the locket.

options.name: Keep Locket (Cherished/Confused)
options.description: Hold onto this piece of your past.

title: Returned Old Man's Pouch
description: You return the pouch. A small act of kindness, or perhaps just avoiding pathetic theft.

options.name: Leave Tavern
options.description: Exit.

title: Escape after Lagger Fight
description: After defeating the lagging cultist, you flee back into the wilderness before the others arrive.

options.name: Wilderness Escape
options.description: You are free but possibly pursued.

title: Capture after Lagger Defeat
description: Defeated by the lagging cultist, you are re-captured by the arriving Unbound.

options.name: Dragged to Lighthouse
options.description: Continue as captive.

title: Escape using Hostage
description: Using the cultist as a shield or bargaining chip, you successfully escape from the Unbound.

options.name: Wilderness Freedom
options.description: You are free.

title: Final Confrontation: Valerius
description: The final battle against Master Valerius and his remaining allies (Servant/Constructs/Unbound?) within the lighthouse!

options.name: Victory!
options.description: You defeat Valerius!

options.name: Defeat! (Ending)
options.description: Valerius triumphs. [Game Over]

title: Final Confrontation: Unbound
description: The final battle against the Unbound leader Kaelen and his cultists within the lighthouse!

options.name: Victory!
options.description: You defeat the Unbound!

options.name: Defeat! (Ending)
options.description: The Unbound triumph. [Game Over / Bad Ending]

title: Final Confrontation: Keeper Marius
description: The final battle against Keeper Marius within the lighthouse!

options.name: Victory!
options.description: You defeat the Keeper!

options.name: Defeat! (Ending)
options.description: Marius stops you. [Game Over / Capture Ending]

title: Ritual Succeeds! (Ending)
description: You witness the Unbound ritual succeed OR Valerius activate the Focusing Array. Reality shudders, the lighthouse groans, a wave of immense power washes out. Loc is free, or reality is unmade, or Valerius achieves godhood. Whatever the outcome, the world has irrevocably changed. Your role in it is uncertain. [Bad Ending / World-Altering Event]

options.name: Face the New Reality (Ending)
options.description: The story ends here.

title: Ritual Fails / Factions Destroy Each Other (Ending)
description: The ritual fails spectacularly OR the factions (Valerius/Unbound/Keeper) destroy each other in the final confrontation. The lighthouse might be damaged, the Tumbler perhaps lost or inert. The immediate threat is neutralized, but the underlying power remains. You are left amidst the ruins. [Neutral Ending / Sequel Hook?]

options.name: Survey the Aftermath (Ending)
options.description: What remains? What next?

title: Lighthouse Victory Aftermath
description: You stand victorious amidst the wreckage in the lighthouse. Your enemies are defeated. What do you do now?

options.name: Destroy the Focusing Array / Ritual Site (Ending)
options.description: Prevent anyone else from using it. [Good/Neutral Ending]

options.name: Claim the Power / Artifacts (Ending)
options.description: Take the Tumbler, Reliquary, Notes for yourself. [Neutral/Evil Ending]

options.name: Leave the Lighthouse As Is (Ending)
options.description: Walk away from the dangerous power. [Neutral Ending]

title: Looting After Stair Fight
description: Looting your opponent on the stairs yields [Appropriate minor loot based on enemy - e.g., Unbound Dagger, Servant nothing, Marius maybe Orders, Valerius maybe notes].

options.name: Continue Up/Down Stairs
options.description: Proceed.

title: Logbook and Crate Mystery
description: The log confirms the link between the shipwreck, the strange crate, and the crew's madness. The crate held something dangerous from the Whispering Shoals.

options.name: Keep Logbook
options.description: Hold onto it.

title: Using Keeper Robes
description: You don the old Keeper robes. They might grant passage or fool someone briefly, but actual Keepers or those familiar with them will see through the disguise.

options.name: Attempt Disguise
options.description: Try bluffing your way past someone.

options.name: Remove Robes
options.description: Decide against using them.

title: Taking Trade Bars
description: You take the silver trade bars (Value 50 GP).

options.name: Ascend Stairs
options.description: Leave cellar.

title: Taking Cellar Shard
description: You take the obsidian shard found in the niche.

options.name: Ascend Stairs
options.description: Leave cellar.

title: Taking Glittering Dust
description: You take the pouch of strange glittering dust.

items.name: Glittering Dust Pouch
items.description: A pouch of fine, glittering dust of unknown properties.

options.name: Ascend Stairs
options.description: Leave cellar.

title: Fleeing Cellar Encounter
description: Hearing someone approach, you retreat back down into the cellar.

options.name: Hide in Cellar
options.description: Find cover.

options.name: Escape via Grate
options.description: Try leaving the lighthouse.

title: Lighthouse Mid-Level Search Results
description: You take the minor supplies or discarded note found in the lighthouse mid-level room.

options.name: Find Stairs
options.description: Locate staircase.

title: Stairs Blocked?
description: You find the stairs, but the way up OR down is blocked by rubble or a magically sealed door!

options.name: Try to Clear Rubble/Open Door
options.description: [Strength/Arcana check?].

options.name: Explore Current Level More
options.description: Search for another way.

title: Hiding in Lab
description: You quickly hide amongst the strange machinery in the lab as footsteps approach.

options.name: Remain Hidden (Stealth Check)
options.description: Hope they don't find you.

title: Lighthouse Victory!
description: You have defeated the primary antagonist(s) in the lighthouse! The immediate threat is over.

options.name: Decide Fate of Lighthouse/Artifacts
options.description: Destroy array? Claim power? Leave?

title: Lighthouse Aftermath
description: The ritual failed or the factions destroyed each other. You are left standing in the aftermath within the lighthouse. What now?

options.name: Search for Survivors/Loot
options.description: Check bodies and the area.

options.name: Destroy Array / Ensure Threat Ended
options.description: Make sure the danger is truly over.

options.name: Leave the Lighthouse
options.description: Walk away.

title: Looting Stair Opponent
description: You loot the opponent defeated on the stairs.

options.name: Continue Up/Down Stairs
options.description: Proceed.

title: Unbound Leave with Tumbler
description: Having secured the Tumbler, the Unbound leader nods to you (if allied) and they depart Silas's shop, likely heading for the lighthouse.

options.name: Follow Them
options.description: Continue your alliance/observation.

options.name: Let Them Go
options.description: Part ways.

title: Taking Mundane Loot (Silas Heist)
description: You pocket miscellaneous coins and pawned goods while the Unbound focus on artifacts.

options.name: Leave with Unbound / Part Ways
options.description: Decide whether to follow them.

title: Silas Survives
description: Silas managed to fight off the Unbound! He looks shaken but alive, possibly injured.

options.name: Approach Silas
options.description: Talk to him.

options.name: Leave
options.description: Slip away.

title: Unbound Lair Cleared
description: You have defeated Kaelen and the Unbound cultists in their wilderness lair (cave/ruin). The immediate threat they posed is ended.

options.name: Search the Lair Thoroughly
options.description: Look for remaining loot, prisoners, or information.

options.name: Leave the Lair
options.description: Return to wilderness path or civilization.

title: Griffon Spoils
description: You take the valuable Griffon Feathers / Victim's Trinkets / Griffon Eggs from the nest.

options.name: Continue Towards Oakhaven
options.description: Proceed.

title: Marius's Plans (Post-Victory)
description: 'Next?' Marius surveys the scene. 'Secure any Fragments. Ensure the Lighthouse mechanism is stable or disabled. Report to my Order. As for you... stay out of trouble.' He seems intent on containing the situation.

options.name: Offer Further Assistance
options.description: Help him secure lighthouse/fragments.

options.name: Part Ways
options.description: Let him handle it.

title: Using Keeper Lore
description: Armed with knowledge from the Keeper archives (e.g., ritual weaknesses, array shutdown sequence), you prepare to act.

options.name: Proceed to Main Chamber to Intervene
options.description: Go confront Valerius/Unbound.

title: Ally Intervention (Jail)
description: Help arrives! Elara uses magic or influence, OR Marius intimidates the guards, OR another ally creates a diversion/unlocks your cell. You are freed!

options.name: Escape Nestlebrook with Ally
options.description: Leave town together.

options.name: Join Ally to Confront Threat
options.description: Work with them against Lighthouse/Factions.

title: Enemy Intervention (Jail) (Ending)
description: Your notoriety attracted the wrong attention. Unbound cultists break into the jail, silencing guards and freeing you for their own dark purposes OR Keeper Marius arranges for your 'accidental' demise in custody. [Capture / Game Over]

options.name: The End / Captured by Unbound
options.description: Your story ends here.

title: Approaching Silas (Post-Fight)
description: You approach Silas after he surprisingly fought off the Unbound. He looks shaken, maybe injured. 'You... you saw that? They'll be back!'

options.name: Offer Protection (Again?)
options.description: Reiterate offer, maybe he'll accept now.

options.name: Ask for Information (Reward?)
options.description: Maybe he's grateful enough to talk.

options.name: Leave Him Be
options.description: Let him deal with his problems.

title: Leaving Rigged Game (Winner)
description: You and your cheating partner successfully fleece the other gamblers and split the winnings (~25-30 GP each) before leaving the Leaky Barrel's back room.

options.name: Part Ways with Partner
options.description: Alliance over.

title: Questioning Old Man (Locket)
description: You try to question the drunk old man about the familiar locket. He's mostly incoherent but mumbles something about 'found it... near the old docks... years ago... reminder of...' before passing out again.

options.name: Keep Locket (Mystery Lingers)
options.description: The origin remains unclear.

title: Destroying the Array (Ending)
description: You decide the Focusing Array in the lantern room is too dangerous to exist. Using force or perhaps knowledge gained from notes/archives, you smash critical components or disrupt its power source. The lighthouse ceases its unnatural hum; the immediate threat of Loc's release or Valerius's plan is ended. [Good/Neutral Ending]

options.name: Leave Nestlebrook, Threat Averted (Ending)
options.description: Your work here is done.

title: Claiming the Power (Ending)
description: With your enemies defeated, you stand before the Focusing Array and the collected artifacts (Tumbler, Reliquary contents?). You decide to claim this power for yourself, perhaps seeking to control Loc, rewrite reality, or simply gain immense arcane might. Your path forward is one of dangerous ambition. [Neutral/Evil Ending]

options.name: Embrace the Power (Ending)
options.description: Your story continues, forever changed.

title: Attempting Keeper Disguise
description: Wearing the old Keeper robes, you try to pass yourself off as one of them. [Deception check vs observer's Insight/Knowledge]. Success: They are fooled briefly. Failure: They see through it immediately.

options.name: Disguise Succeeds (Temporarily)
options.description: Use the momentary confusion.

options.name: Disguise Fails!
options.description: Prepare for confrontation.

title: Clearing Blocked Stairs
description: You attempt to clear the rubble or break the seal blocking the stairs. [Strength/Arcana check]. Success: Path cleared! Failure: Obstruction remains.

options.name: Proceed Up/Down (If Success)
options.description: Continue.

options.name: Find Another Way (If Failure)
options.description: Explore current level.

title: Lighthouse Aftermath Search
description: Searching the lighthouse after the climax: You might find the Tumbler, Reliquary contents, Valerius's notes, Marius's axe, or other faction gear among the wreckage or bodies.

options.name: Take Recovered Items
options.description: Loot the scene.

options.name: Leave Lighthouse
options.description: Depart.

title: Searching Unbound Lair
description: Thoroughly searching the Unbound lair (cave/ruin) after clearing it: You find their main stash of supplies, details of their ritual plans, correspondence with Valerius, OR a map hinting at other Unbound cells.

options.name: Take Findings
options.description: Gather loot and crucial intel.

options.name: Destroy Lair?
options.description: Try setting fire or causing collapse.

options.name: Leave Lair
options.description: Depart.

title: Joining Ally after Jailbreak
description: Freed from jail by your ally (Elara/Marius), you join them to confront the main threat - likely heading directly to the lighthouse.

options.name: Proceed to Lighthouse with Ally
options.description: Face the final challenge together.

title: Disguise Success (Keeper)
description: Your Keeper disguise fools someone (Servant? Unbound grunt?) briefly, allowing you to pass or gain momentary advantage.

options.name: Press Advantage
options.description: Use the confusion to act.

title: Disguise Failure (Keeper)
description: Your disguise is seen through immediately! Prepare for combat or flee!

options.name: Fight!
options.description: Combat.

options.name: Flee!
options.description: Run.

title: Unbound Lair Loot Secured
description: You leave the Unbound lair with valuable supplies, intel, and possibly leads on further cult activities.

options.name: Report Findings (Elara/Marius)
options.description: Share intel with potential allies.

options.name: Leave Area
options.description: Continue journey.

title: Destroying Unbound Lair
description: You take steps to destroy the Unbound lair, perhaps setting fires or causing a cave-in, ensuring they cannot easily return.

options.name: Leave (Lair Destroyed)
options.description: Depart the scene.

title: To the Lighthouse (w/ Ally)
description: Alongside your ally (Elara or Marius), you approach the Tidecaller Lighthouse for the final confrontation.

options.name: Final Approach
options.description: Begin the assault/infiltration.

title: Using Disguise Advantage
description: Using the momentary confusion caused by your Keeper disguise, you can attempt to attack with surprise, slip past, or issue a false command.

options.name: Attack with Surprise
options.description: Strike!

options.name: Slip Past
options.description: Move deeper into lighthouse.

title: Lighthouse Finale Prep
description: With your ally, you plan the final approach on the lighthouse.

options.name: Direct Assault
options.description: Force the main door.

options.name: Stealth Approach
options.description: Look for grate or climb.

title: Rescued Prisoner Gratitude (Ending)
description: The rescued prisoners offer heartfelt thanks. Some offer meager possessions (food, few coins) or promise to speak well of you. Your intervention saved lives, though the larger Unbound threat may remain. You part ways. [Good Deed Ending / Branch End]

options.name: Continue Your Journey
options.description: Leave the area.

title: Defending Prisoners (Ending)
description: You fight bravely to defend the escaping prisoners from the Unbound ambushers. [Final Combat determines ending]. Victory: Prisoners escape, you survive. Defeat: You fall, prisoners recaptured/killed. [Heroic / Tragic Ending]

options.name: Victory: Escape with Survivors (Ending)
options.description: You saved them.

options.name: Defeat: Sacrifice in Vain (Ending)
options.description: You failed.

title: Final Report to Elara (Ending)
description: You return to Elara, reporting the events at the lighthouse - Valerius stopped, the ritual averted, the Tumbler secured or destroyed. She nods, satisfied or perhaps contemplative about the future. She offers final words of wisdom or warning. [Quest Complete / Branch End]

options.name: Leave Nestlebrook, Task Done (Ending)
options.description: Your story concludes.

title: Final Report to Marius (Ending)
description: You report to Keeper Marius (if alive), confirming the threat from Valerius/Unbound is neutralized. He acknowledges your role, perhaps with grudging respect or a stern warning about meddling further. His duty here seems concluded. [Branch End]

options.name: Leave Nestlebrook, Order Restored (Ending)
options.description: Your story concludes.

title: Alone with the Tumbler (Ending)
description: You stand victorious, the Whispering Tumbler humming in your hand. Its power is undeniable, its purpose still partially veiled. Do you seek to understand it, control it, or perhaps find the other Fragments? Your path forward is now defined by this artifact. [Ambiguous / Sequel Hook Ending]

items.name: Whispering Tumbler
items.description: A small, complex metal device, humming powerfully.

options.name: Seek Power and Understanding (Ending)
options.description: Your story continues.

title: Magistrate's Judgment (Ending)
description: You are brought before the Nestlebrook magistrate. Based on witness testimony (and your confession or failed denials), you are found guilty of theft/assault/etc. Sentence: Hard labor, lengthy imprisonment, or banishment from the region. Your freedom is lost. [Capture Ending]

options.name: Imprisoned / Banished (Ending)
options.description: Your story ends here.

title: Release via Information (Jail)
description: The Guard Captain finds your information on the factions/lighthouse valuable. In exchange, charges are dropped or significantly reduced. You are released, perhaps with a warning or even a request for further assistance.

options.name: Released!
options.description: You are free.

title: Freedom (Post-Jail)
description: You are free from the Nestlebrook jail, either through bargaining, escape, or ally intervention.

options.name: Leave Nestlebrook Immediately
options.description: Get out of town.

options.name: Retrieve Confiscated Gear?
options.description: Try to get your items back.

options.name: Continue Investigations
options.description: Resume your involvement with Lighthouse/Factions.

title: Escape from Jail!
description: Using a hidden tool, cell weakness, or help from another prisoner, you manage to escape the Nestlebrook jail!

options.name: Escape into the Night
options.description: You are free but now a fugitive.

title: Escape from Jail Fails (Ending)
description: Your attempt to escape jail fails. You are caught, likely facing harsher confinement and extra charges. There seems no way out now. [Capture Ending]

options.name: Imprisoned Indefinitely (Ending)
options.description: Your story ends here.

title: Leaving with Stolen Wood (Ending)
description: You successfully steal some valuable rare wood from Borin's shipment or storage. Finding a buyer for illicit timber might be tricky, but it represents significant potential profit. You leave the scene. [Branch End - Focus shifts to selling wood?]

items.name: Stolen Rare Wood
items.description: Valuable, exotic timber.

options.name: Find Fence / Leave Nestlebrook (Ending)
options.description: Your story continues elsewhere.

title: Using Harbormaster Keys
description: With the harbormaster's keys, you approach the locked shed or his office.

items.name: Harbormaster's Keys
items.description: Keys to the harbormaster's office and lockbox.

options.name: Unlock Shed
options.description: Open the storage shed.

options.name: Unlock Office
options.description: Enter the harbormaster's office.

title: Harbormaster Lockbox
description: You find the harbormaster's seized goods lockbox. It's sturdy.

options.name: Use Keys (If You Have Them)
options.description: Unlock the box.

options.name: Attempt to Pick Lock
options.description: [Thieves' Tools DC 16?].

options.name: Leave Lockbox
options.description: Decide against opening it.

title: Opening Lockbox (Key)
description: Using the harbormaster's key, the lockbox opens easily! Inside is the Mysterious Marked Crate from the shipwreck.

options.name: Take/Examine Crate
options.description: Deal with the crate.

title: Picking Lockbox
description: You attempt to pick the lockbox lock. [Thieves' Tools DC 16]. Success: It opens! Failure: Lock holds.

options.name: Box Opens! (If Success)
options.description: Inside is the Mysterious Marked Crate.

options.name: Leave Lockbox (If Failure)
options.description: Can't open it.

title: Escaping Residence Heist
description: After fighting your way out or escaping the residence (Harbormaster's / Merchant's), you flee into the Nestlebrook night.

options.name: Leave Town
options.description: Escape Nestlebrook.

options.name: Lie Low
options.description: Find a hiding place.

title: Deliver Package Success
description: You successfully deliver the package to 'Scar' at the Salty Dog. He nods, takes it without comment, and gives you a knowing look.

options.name: Return to Leaky Barrel for Payment
options.description: Go get your 20 Silver.

title: Delivery Payment Received
description: You return to the Leaky Barrel. The barkeep grunts and slides 20 Silver Pieces across the counter.

options.name: Job Done
options.description: Decide next move in Seabrook.

title: Package Intercepted (Salty Dogs)
description: Salty Dog gang members block your path. 'That package... looks like something the Kraken scum would send. Hand it over.'

options.name: Fight Salty Dogs
options.description: [Combat].

options.name: Hand Over Package
options.description: Avoid fight, fail job.

options.name: Attempt to Flee
options.description: Run.

title: Fighting Salty Dogs (Delivery)
description: You fight the Salty Dog members over the package.

options.name: Victory!
options.description: Defeat them, continue delivery.

options.name: Defeat! (Ending)
options.description: They beat you, take package. [Game Over / Setback].

title: Package Surrendered (Salty Dogs)
description: You hand the package over to the Salty Dogs to avoid a fight. They take it and leave. You've failed the delivery job.

options.name: Return to Leaky Barrel (Report Failure)
options.description: Face the angry barkeep.

options.name: Avoid Leaky Barrel
options.description: Don't go back.

title: Fleeing Salty Dogs (Delivery)
description: You flee from the Salty Dog members, still carrying the package.

options.name: Escape Successfully
options.description: Continue delivery attempt.

options.name: Caught!
options.description: They catch you.

title: Package Intercepted (Guards)
description: A bored-looking Seabrook guard stops you. 'Bit unusual, carrying a package like that. Mind if I ask what's inside?'

options.name: Bluff / Lie
options.description: 'Just delivering supplies.' [Deception Check].

options.name: Refuse to Answer / Flee
options.description: Raises suspicion, likely leads to chase/arrest.

options.name: Allow Search? (Risky)
options.description: Let the guard open it.

title: Bluffing Guard (Package)
description: You try bluffing the guard. Success: He waves you on. Failure: He insists on searching the package.

options.name: Continue Delivery (If Success)
options.description: Proceed.

options.name: Deal with Search (If Failure)
options.description: Guard opens package.

title: Fleeing Guard (Package)
description: You refuse to cooperate and run from the guard!

options.name: Escape!
options.description: Get away.

options.name: Caught!
options.description: Guard catches you.

title: Guard Searches Package
description: The guard opens the package, revealing the contents [Weapons/Coins/Clockwork]. His reaction depends on legality.

options.name: Contents Illegal! (Arrest - Ending)
options.description: Guard arrests you for contraband.

options.name: Contents Suspicious but Legal?
options.description: Guard is wary, lets you go with warning.

options.name: Contents Mundane?
options.description: Guard shrugs, lets you go.

title: Caught by Guard (Package - Ending)
description: The guard catches you after you flee. You are arrested for suspicious activity and resisting. The package is confiscated. [Capture Ending]

options.name: Arrested (Ending)
options.description: Your story ends here.

title: Keeping Package Contents
description: You decide to keep the [Weapons/Coins/Clockwork parts] found in the package, betraying the delivery job.

options.name: Deal with Consequences
options.description: Avoid Leaky Barrel / Face angry barkeep / Sell loot.

title: Lie About Delivery
description: You return to the Leaky Barrel and lie to the barkeep (delivered / lost / stolen). [Deception check]. Success: He pays you / accepts loss. Failure: He knows you're lying!

options.name: Lie Succeeds
options.description: Get paid or avoid anger.

options.name: Lie Fails! (Face Barkeep)
options.description: He's furious.

title: Meeting Squid Observed?
description: From hiding, you watch Squid meet another figure. They exchange packages or coin. You might recognize the other figure OR overhear snippets about smuggled goods/routes.

options.name: Report Findings (Guard/Bounty)
options.description: Gather proof for bounty.

options.name: Confront Squid / Contact?
options.description: Reveal yourself.

title: Reporting Smuggler (Ending)
description: You report your findings about the smuggler 'Squid' to the Seabrook Watch. If your proof is convincing, they pay you the 25 GP bounty. Squid will likely be arrested or flee town. [Quest End / Branch End]

options.name: Collect Bounty, Continue (Ending)
options.description: Gain reward, story continues.
